Their veggie burger is really, really good. I appreciate that they have a full vegan and vegetarian menu and make all of their veg items on separate cooking systems. Food is good, ambiance is great, and staff is super friendly. I came here for brunch and ended up ordering more than I should have because it all looked so good. They also have great fried green tomatoes as well as an assortment of dips and spreads for your bread. All in all a great spot, I will be back very often.

Great variety of food menu. The food is absolutely awesome. Couldn't be more well prepared. Waiters and Waitresses are very customer service savvy and nice. I am not so fan of the decoration. It's awkward. and loud of course!
Make reservation!!Awesome food!
Went with the family. Can't wait to go again.

A good, reliable place for lunch or dinner. Usually packed, so the noise level is a little above-average. Food is comforting and good. The Ribs were tender, the hibiscus soda was refreshingly tart. Also tried the Brussels sprouts which were delicious. Dessert was a little disappointing. All in all it is a good place to go for a nice meal.

Loved this place. Great food, Great food, Great food! Making the reservation is not easy as they are super busy. I am not very impressed by their decoration that they think is very cool! But staff and waiters and waitresses are nice, friendly and professional. A great place to dine at !

Let's add another review to the 2000+. Was with a huge group - 15+ I would say. We had made reservations but still had to wait around for half an hour after our reservation time, because there was a couple taking up one of the large tables that we had reserved, and having been in food service I get that kicking them out even subtly would kill the tip, so I wasn't overly annoyed. Just really hungry.However, to make up for the wait, we got a few free appetizers. The cornbread- DELICIOUS. Bits of actual corn in it (shocker I know) and server in a small adorable little iron skillet. There were also fried green tomatoes, which tasted just like they sound (breaded hot green tomatoes) but the person that said they actually enjoyed those had a good time, so I'll trust his judgement on those. I got a California Burger (if that's the name, I can't remember, it was a few months ago), and it was delicious. Perhaps a bit expensive for a burger but the taste was excellent. Others said their dishes were fantastic. Took a few tries to get our water, and our waiter was occasionally unnecessarily curt, but it was a Sunday afternoon, so we must have hit a rush or something. Understandable. Overall, a bit expensive, but worth the food. Decor was a mix of rustic/modernish. Cute ^^
Our food and drinks were tops. Plan to come back soon!
Great for brunch. Tasty, fresh, and well portioned.
Make reservations and order brunch!
Half chicken very well seasoned and tender, lemonade is fresh, everything is fresh tasting
Excellent!
LOVED the deviled eggs.
The food was very good, but the cocktails were mediocre. It's a nice restaurant but it is on the pricier side!

I have visited FF several times now for dinner, and each time has been very enjoyable. As others have said: Make a reservation!The dishes I have tasted: cornbread, popcorn of the day (Old Bay butter) plank salmon with choice of 2 sides (butternut squash and mashed potatoes), scallops with squash risotto, and Ahi Tuna poke salad. The highlights: the popcorn of the day, plank salmon, and scallop dishes were fantastic. Well-cooked, great seasonings, and awesome flavors. The popcorn is a large bowl for $2, making it a great choice for a small group. Flavors rotate daily. The risotto with the scallops is definitely rich, but incredibly tasty, especially if you go hungry! I have also heard great things about the French dip sandwich (it's huge!), steak and eggs, and butternut squash risotto.The not-so-great: I thought the cornbread was quite bland. Perhaps this is why it is served with a side of honey-butter, but I was disappointed. The Ahi tuna salad with fried wonton was good - certainly spicy, for my taste - but my biggest criticism was that the tuna should have been fresher. It was somewhat mushy. I probably would not order it again.The restaurant is large, so it can get noisy, but it's not supposed to be a quiet date spot. I have never had problems with the service, they have a vegan menu, and my friends tell me their homemade drinks/sodas (though expensive) are outstanding. Overall - a great place with a massive menu (good for groups because of the variety) and reasonable prices!
I loved the chicken and waffles for brunch. Good for DC.
Churrasco... yummy!

My friends and I stopped in after a meeting in downtown DC. The food was absolutely delicious! I had the Ahi Tuna salad which was very flavorful. We also loved the fried green tomatoes, skillet cornbread the red velvet cake for dessert. I also enjoyed their cucumber drink.. that was sooo good. Light, refreshing with a smooth finish. I also want to say that this place has hands down, the cutest guys working here of any establishment I've been to in Washington DC. Everywhere we looked their was a good looking guy walking by.. from the bartenders to the waiters and even the host! I guess Founding Farmers understands that after a stressful day of work all a girl needs is a good meal, good drink and some nice eye candy to look at...... we will definitely be back!

The only thing I can complain about with this place is that you need a reservation and it is always crowded. But that's because the food is so damn good!I not a fancy (nor healthy) guy but this place has got classic dishes that are tasty and also made from healthy, locally grown ingredients. Best part, I take my dates here and it makes me look classy! :)Thanks Founding Farmers!
I like this place but the wait is forever. The menu is good especially the grilled cheese and soup but the service could be improved.
Great food...very comforting.
solid and consistent. love it!
pretty good place. came here with the girls for brunch- everything is made in house. The bread is delicious. Hostess was nice. Charming.

Food was great. I had the chicken and waffles and the house-made ginger ale. My husband had a ham and egg tartine that came with egg salad on top instead of a poached egg, as advertised. Definitely worth checking out, but make a reservation and be patient.
Good comfort food and great atmosphere... Besides tables being to close together.

Last time I came here, we sat downstairs on a Friday night, and it was too loud to hear each other talking. So this time, I requested an upstairs table when I made the reservation, and I was pleasantly surprised that they honored the request! We had a great table, one of those circular booths. We ordered way too much food, but with such a big menu it's hard to not over-indulge. The cornbread is amazing, as are the fried green tomatoes and the devilish eggs. I have a hard time ordering anything other than the center cut filet, because it's always so delicious, and they always cook it just right. Great food, never a disappointment.
Great food and service. I can't wait to go back. DA BOMB!

What a treat??? My husband and I had been planning to try this place for some time as we are both becoming for health conscious. We happend to be in the area and realized we were close to this restaurant. It was later in the evening probably 30 mins before they stopped serving dinner. I really thought that since they were close to closing that they would rush us through our meal. I was pleasently surprised!!! The waiter was very nice and didn't make any suggestions to hint us toward leaving....which was nice. I've never had fried green tomatos but decided to try them. WOW...they were delish! My husband enjoyed the food and the service. We will definitely go back!!

Absolutely adore Founding Farmers. Some dishes that are favs of mine are: Bacon Lollis, Popcorn of the Day, Kentucky Burgoo Stew, Slow-Simmered Sirloin Chili and Southern Pan-Fried Chicken. Just can't get enough. Sometimes the wait can be excessive, even if you have booked a reservation ahead of time. Other than that, it is top notch!
Great Place for business lunch, happy hour or even group party. Reservation is a must. The place is also packed and hard to get a table. Go early....

Definitely get reservations, it gets pretty packed. Food and drinks delicious, but the real standout was the service. Chu, our bartender, made excellent recommendations and made sure my birthday was special.
Very cool space, good service, and delicious food.
Great place! I have only been here for lunch once, but I had the fried chicken and it was excellent! I will definitely be returning.
Love almost everything except the waiting time.

Founding Farmers is a wonderful restaurant. I took my family of four here and we had a delightful experience. My son ordered the Macaroni and Cheese and the fresh lemonade and he was in heaven. I highly recommend the Velvet Cake. The service is great and the restaurant is flexible about changes in orders. You should probably make reservations because there tends to be a long wait for a table. It is quite popular. Brunch seems to be their specialty.
The food was great and I love what they stand for, but the service was lacking some motivation.

Food was so good for dinner, we came back, the next day for brunch. Restaurant was very clean. Service wasn't the best but staff was friendly and food more than made up for it. I thought it was resonably priced for the quality.

I was totally terrified because it's in the big scary IMF building (evil!) but they're not related... and the meal I had was fantastic... they really do make everything from scratch. Brunch plates were kindof small, I have to say, but delicious. Dinner has bigger portions and get the bread pudding! Yum. One big thing needs to change... service was slow and first dish that came out was cold. Kinks to work on for sure.
great cocktails! $$$$$

My first impression upon walking in- wow those puffy clouds are awesome on the ceiling. Then my thoughts went to- wow the bar is crowded. Stopped by on a Friday night happy hr and ended up staying for a delicious dinner. I ordered the deviled eggs appetizer- fairly plain but fresh with sea salt and onion. and for entree, I chose the straw/hay pasta, which was enormous elbow shaped macaroni with mushrooms, peas, pancetta and cream sauce. Outstanding. Everyone seemed pleased with their food. The waitress did a few screwy things with our bill b/c we had 10 people but service was good. Love the barn-like sliding door, and the general feel of being in a rustic place which also happens to be inside the IMF building. Love the parsnips and seasonal veggie choices.
I go to this place all of the time with Cookie. We love it.

I loved this place. I tried it in the first week or so that they were open. The space itself is urban chic and a welcome addition to Foggy Bottom. I used to work at 2000 Penn and it would have been great to have had a Founding Farmers nearby during my 5+ year stint in the neighborhood.The drinks... I love the pre-prohibition-style bar concept. They have no pre-made mixers, everything is crafted by hand when you order. They've also put significant thought into how best to keep your drink at its most perfect as you sip... giant ice cubes - leaving you more time to enjoy your beverage before it turns into a less appealing, watery version of its former self.I had the bacon lollis to start.  If you are a pork eater, I highly recommend these! As you walk through the restaurant to your table, if you note the sweet, sweet aroma of bacon, brown sugar and cinnamon (yes, the smell is THAT distinctive)... that would be the lollis. Not to be missed for the non-vegetarian crowd.Since I had bacon to start, I opted for a salad entree. The Spicy Ahi Tuna Poke salad was spectacular! SUPER spicy (so beware) with a wonderful sesame vinaigrette. Having traveled to Hawaii on a number of occasions, I was first drawn to this dish because of the poke (traditional Hawaiian sushi-like dish). While I wouldn't say the ahi was true poke-style, my disappointment at not having traditional poke in this dish was quickly overtaken by my sheer delight at the flavor combination - sweet, spicy... so yummy. I'll go back again and again for this salad (though I certainly hope to try many more items from the menu as well).Overall, a lovely experience. Great place for groups. Vibrant bar scene. Reasonably priced entrees. Oh, and surprisingly large portions... go with a big appetite or plan to eat family-style.
Today we had eaten at Founding Farmers and had Tyron as our waiter and he was such a lovely help. Checking in on us for any thing we needed.
Abby is amazing. The food was wonderful but Abby made our experience even better. We will be back
Abby was super helpful today! She recommended the strawberry soda which was yummy! She checked in on us often but not so often that we couldn't enjoy our food and chat time!
Food was excellent. Jorge was our server and he was great! Girls at the bar quick and great! Great vibe!
JORGE is an amazing server. How he manages the millions of side orders of a big table with grace and genuine kindness super impressive.
Emily was a great and patient server. Had a great experience. She made good recommendations based on what I was interested in
Food and service was amazing! Abby did a great job and was very friendly! we'd highly recommend!

One of our favorite spots in DC when we are visiting. The service was absolutely outstanding - the our server Abby was friendly, attentive, and made us feel so welcome. Our food came out incredibly fast and everything was cooked to perfection. The atmosphere was warm and inviting, with a great vibe that made it the perfect place to relax and enjoy a delicious meal. Highly recommend!
Abby took care of us so well and the food was awesome. The general manager sat us quickly and checked on our experience. Highly recommend
Abby was fantastic- made my daughter's birthday great. Food is great and service was wonderful. I love the ambiance.David
Great service, Shadane was lovely. Chai latte was tasty and my friend enjoyed her Aztec latte
Good food good fun good service A bit noisy with all the hard surfacesInteresting and sustainable offerings
Sanovia was an amazing staff who helped us get everything we needed with a jolly manner
Snow is the most amazing waitress and was so cheery even while working on Christmas morning ! Food was great too!
Amazing service, wonderful people, and amazing food! Had tried a couple other spots around town (5 in total) and this place was my number one. Will be coming back! Thank you!
Ashley was INCREDIBLE! she was courteous and very knowledgeable of the menu and options. I am definitely coming back and hopefully will get Ashley
Founding Farmers is one of my favorite restaurants in DC!! The food is fresh and delicious and the service is top tier. Meara, my server, was very kind and attentive!

Founding Fathers DC is a fantastic spot for those craving Southern-inspired cuisine. The menu offers hearty options for lunch and dinner, showcasing classic dishes with bold flavors. For breakfast enthusiasts, the selection is just as impressive, featuring fluffy biscuits, indulgent beignets, waffles, and decadent French toast.We visited during brunch and decided to explore the heavier lunch menu. Every dish was perfectly executed, balancing rich Southern flavors with refined presentation. A standout moment of our meal was dessert -- the vanilla bean cheesecake was divine, with a creamy texture and just the right hint of sweetness. It's a must-try!A word of advice: make a reservation. The restaurant's popularity means long lines, especially during peak hours. Founding Fathers DC is a delightful blend of Southern charm and culinary excellence, and it's well worth the visit!
Great restaurant, excellent food, location and service, AL is the best!!The atmosphere was very good, we had very nice evening.
Al was terrific. Ask for him as your waiter. He was responsive. Gave good suggestions.
Al was awesome! Friendly and provided great service. When we asked about Fred, he recommended the cornbread and it was delicious!
Al is awesome! Food is good. Got shrimp and grits. Good stuff good stuff. Nice atmosphere, friendly staff.
Loved the food. Always exceeds expectations. Al was great too, we loved his shirt, such a kind young man.
Every time I'm in DC I go here. And never disappoints! I've tried many things and everything has been simply delicious.
Mauro was my server. He was great! Recommended a yummy dish and was super warm and friendly.
Al was fantastic and nice. He was super accommodating and went extra mile to help. He had a great demeanor.
Abby was fabulous for our delicious thanksgiving feast today!! The food was so good and service was superb!
Al was the man. Helpful, attentive, friendly. everything you'd want in a good waitor.

the food was fantastic! we got our food super quick when the restaurant was very busy, and our server Al was consistently checking in making sure everything was good. the restaurant has a cute atmosphere and comfortable seating! in summary, i loved eating here!

We came here as our friend recommended it.The food was great (Yankee Pot Roast & Chicken Pot Pie), ambiance in the restaurant was very welcoming and cosy, and the service given by our server Al was phenomenal. Would definitely recommend on a trip to DC!
Al was an awesome server, recommended us the chicken pot pie which was delicious Will absolutely recommend Founding Farmers
Amazing food, perfect atmosphere and incredible service. Our server Al made the experience unforgettable
Al was great. We had an amazing time and he was very accommodating to us during our time here!
Al was an amazing waiter. Was really helpful as we were deciding our food. Incredibly friendly and made sure we had a quality time with both the food and our experience.
Al was great and respectful. Loved the food. Chicken was extremely juicy alongside the waffles.
Great food, great service, great atmosphere. Met up with family in DC - first time at this restaurant - wouldn't hesitate to come back!
Amazing atmosphere and food. very nice people, amazing place to stop and get some good food.
Fantastic meal!! Our server made a great recommendation and it was the best chicken I have ever had. Would definitely recommend!
the food was amazing and so was the service. Meara was attentive and friendly. I highly recommend this place. The decor and ambiance were perfect
Victor was amazing and the food was stellar!! Would definitely return and ask for him again!
Victor was our server tonight. He did an awesome job taking care of our table. We appreciate all he did to accommodate us.
Briaunna was very respectful and attentive to us! The food was great, prepared fresh and in a timely manner.
Brianna was amazing 5 stars all around. Food and service were amazing. 10 out of 10 would recommend.
great service thanks to Victor! Good food - very fresh, and lots of options. Salmon was cooked very well on my salad
Shadane is the best! Food always an 11/10 but she made the experience a true five star. If emojis were able to be written into reviews, it would all be heart eyes !!!!!

The food, drinks, and dessert choices were extensive and delicious. Something for everyone! Our waiter, Victor, was attentive and helpful when making menu choices. A delicious meal in a high energy environment with excellent service and food. Definitely recommend Founding Farmers as a dinner destination!
Very knowledgeable waiter.  Made wonderful recommendations. Victor was very friendly and helpful. GREAT FOOD, SERVICE, AMBIANCE
Excellent food and drinks. I would definitely be back. We ordered the salmon smoked bread and the goat cheese ravioli.
Absolutely delicious food and cocktails, fantastic atmosphere and service! Jorge was our server and made us feel so welcome! Get the bacon lollies, you won't be sorry!
Byron was amazing!! Managed our large party excellently while also training a new staff member! Food is always high quality and was a delightful atmosphere , only made better by excellent service!
Anthony was attentive, friendly, and kind. Great service and great food! Very happy with the experience!
The waiter Enrique is worth coming back just for him! He gave us food for the Soul, not just stomach. Jesus is Lord!?
Abby was a fantastic waitress. She was friendly, efficient, and really good at her job.
Abby was absolutely AWESOME for our party of 12! Yummy caesar salad and would definitely recommend seasonal soda.
Abby was a wonderful waitress and worked to entertain my nephew. The food was delicious and the ambiance (while a little loud) was good for families.
Our server Meara was wonderful!! She was so helpful and nice and really made our experience fantastic :)
The food was great (scrambles and pancakes are delicious) but the service is the best part. Both Abby and Tyren are great. We ate here two days in a row and were well taken care of both times
Abby and Tyren were courteous, professional and attentive. She engaged in conversation outside of menus selections, and made the experience wonderful!
fantastic meal. Meara was our server and was great! Could not have asked for a better experience!
WONDERFUL food and a WONDERFUL server!! Jorge was very attentive, knowledgeable, and polite.
Byron made this experience incredible. I'm very grateful and the food was great. He was attentive and helpful.
Amazing brunch. Denis, Liz, and Tai were fantastic. Food was exceptional and service was top notch
We sat at the bar and had a delicious breakfast. The service offered by Liz, Tai and Dennis was outstanding. We will definitely return on our next trip to DC
Liz is the best waiter ever!!! the tacos and pancakes are the bomb. Make sure to get them with blueberries.
great service, great food. highly recommend! Liz was our server and was so friendly and kind. Great experience!

Our server, Nicholas, provided five star service to us the entire evening! He was very knowledgeable about the menu and cocktails and made excellent recommendations. Most of all, he was super attentive and welcoming. The yankee pot roast we ordered was delicious and the dark chocolate covered strawberries were a wonderful treat. The ambiance was vibrant and fun .... perfect for a Friday evening outing.
Ricardo and Tyrent were phenomenal!! Food was delicious. The egg scrambles were reasonably priced and delectable.
Abby was the most articulate, diplomatic, and helpful server I've had.Thanks for a great experience.

Just had lunch at the Foggy Bottom location.  The food was fantastic. However, David R, our server, was even more fantastic providing a personal touch to great service.  David was great and great to his customers.
great food and incredible service by Enrique who was really kind. the place was really nice

The food and service is second to none. This is my first foodie stop in DC and I must say I am impressed! From the chill vibes, great ambiance, stellar service and phenomenal food I rate this as the top of the top of the top lol! Food was so good I forgot to take pics of everything but trust me, if you're here, you shou stop in! Oh did I mention they offer their own brand of liquors for sale by the bottle!? Rum, tequila, bourbon, gin, vodka and more! Take a little piece of Founding Farmers home with you!
five stars to our waiter Jorge thanks for the awesome food yummy yum yum

Me and my best friend came from Maryland to experience the Nier Orchestra at DAR Constitutional Hall and we chose this place based on the photos' ambiance. The photos do this place justice as the service, food, and vibes were unmatched. Our server Elyes was amazing and extremely attentive to our needs and made sure we were taken care of. We also talked to one of the managers of the establishment and wanted to give our appreciation for the amazing experience we were given coming here. We will DEFINITELY be coming here again next time we're in DC!

Second time coming back to this place and just like the first time, everything was perfect. The food was great and Ashley did a wonderful job explaining everything the menu. 10/10 service. Will be back soon :)
Sanovia was a great waitress! Very nice and pleasant and helpful. She was very attentive and made our experience fantastic. I would recommend!
First time her and the atmosphere was wonderful. Our server Byron was super knowledgeable about the menu and made sure we had a great dining experience.
The atmosphere was excellent and the food was great. Byron our server had excellent customer service, very friendly ,and answered all our questions. I'd definitely come again!
Byron was great! Helped me decide between some good looking food options. ?If I'm in DC again, I would definitely eat here again
Amazing food, friendly staff! Just make sure you book ahead, the lines for walk in can be crazy! Other than that - amazing!!
We had Al on a chilly night on the patio. He was very accommodating and a joy to talk to. The food was amazing and the drinks top notch.

we had a great experience today. Denis, Bern and Wally were very attentive and friendly. The quality of the food was great and the music/noise level was perfect! highly recommend a stop. Lots to choose from!
Al was the absolute best. super friendly and efficient. I ate with my aunt and he catered to both our generations. funny for all! go Al!

I loved everything I had here. I got their fresh bread and whipped butter to start, which was fresh and delicious. I had the gnocchi as my entree, which was elevated by the fresh basil. I finished it off with the bread pudding, which was out of this world. The portion sizes were huge, so I have a full meal of leftovers for lunch tomorrow that I'm very excited about. Will definitely be back to try more menu options!
Excellent food service and ambiance. Victor was our server and he was very friendly and knowledgeable about the menu. The spatchcock chicken was excellent
Victor was fantastic. Great farmer's co-op with fantastic food. Outside of my loud table neighbor, couldn't have been better.
Shadane was fantastic and very welcoming, and the food was delicious! I really enjoyed the goat cheese ravioli with butternut squash pur¨¦e.
Our waitress, Meara was outstanding. Great spot for breakfast. Reasonably prices, and delicious.

Had Abby C. Tonight and the service was amazing! Food was great and she found options for our dairy allergic coworker. Never had to wait for food, refills on drinks or just coming by to check on us. I highly recommend Founding Farmers and ask for Abby!
Snow was awesome! So friendly and attentive. The food was great and everyone was happy with their selection
Sanovia took excellent care of us and made our visit truly worthwhile. The food was great and portions were generous.
Our waitress Snow was great. She helped us navigate the menu so that we made a great choice for a late brunch

Great experience! Liz was the best server ever. Super funny and sweet, and told great stories. Food was excellent too and Liz made sure everything was exactly how we wanted it. An amazing breakfast experience!

I had a great experience! I came here with my family for brunch and it exceeded my expectations. The pancakes were delicious and perfectly fluffy. The eggs tasted great with the pancakes and the bacon was nice and crisp. Definitely recommending.

Food was good, drinks where on point the ribs... my goodness where outstanding as far as the hospitality, our bartenders are top notch we had Liz & been! Those girls where on point keeping up with our drinks and food and constantly checking up on is to make sure we was good, Liz helped us out with finding stuff nearby to do as well! Super sweet girl excellent personality, 10/10 recommend!
Liz was great! Affable, attentive, and amazing. had a great brunch and will be returning
Anthony was a great server! He was very attentive and nice. Food came out quickly and was very good
Amazing staff great food!

Amazing food, atmosphere and service! We got the Street Tacos and they were delicious. My friend got a Bloody Mary and the house mix was nice and spicy. The bartenders Liz, Bern & Will were awesome and super sweet. Highly recommend.
The food was delicious and the service was great! Thanks, Danny (at the bar) for making our first visit so special.
Walter (aka Wally) was an amazing bartender! He served us well during the fantastic happy hour! Thanks, Walter! FIVE STARS!
been coming here for years, and the food and service are always excellent. it's a great place for a casual meal or special night out.
I had Shadane as a server and she was so friendly and accommodating of my food allergies!

The food was amazing! I had chicken and waffles and it came with scrambled eggs and gravy. All cooked to perfection. The waffle was light and crispy and not heavy and doughy at all. Cinnamon syrup was to die for and Enrique our server was very kind and personable!

We discovered this restaurant by chance, as it was near our hotel in Foggy Bottom. The dining hall is relatively big, and there are some tables on the sidewalk outside. We were served by Victor, friendly and professional, who introduced us to Founding Farmers, its philosophy and operations, and graciously helped us with our different choices. The food was very good, tasty and well prepared, with a decent selection of draft beers and a delightfully sinful dessert menu (the Death by Chocolate and the Key Lime Pie were delicious). The place is popular, reserving is almost a must, but even if crowded it was not too noisy, background music was at a reasonably low volume, the overall atmosphere was pleasant and relaxed. The bill for the two of us was $98 plus a well deserved tip. We will be happy to go back if we are again in the area.
Victor was amazing! The food and environment was the incredible. I would recommend this place to anyone in the DMV area.

Someone back home recommended this restaurant as soon as they found out we were coming to D.C.! The food was amazing and the service was stellar! Sanovia was our waitress and she did a phenomenal job! She answered the questions we had about the menu, was extremely personable and went above and beyond to make our first visit an experience we will not forget!

Really enjoyed the food here, especially the cornbread. Massive thanks to Sanovia (Snow) for providing excellent service. There was a small issue with my steak, but she promptly took care of it. Definitely will come back here on my next trip to DC!

This was my first time dining here. Food was delicious. Our server, Victor, was very friendly, attentive and helpful in our dinner selections. Looking forward to coming back the next time I'm in town.
Elyes and Al were the best waiters at this place. Would fly back again from KC to hang w em.

Amazing restraunt, both the food and the aesthetic were impeccable. Unfortunately, these were outshone by the beam of joy that Elyes and Al were to me. Their smiles were infectious, and they truly made my night. Will come again!
Great vibes, fun scene, awesome food. Victor was the best! A hidden gem. Don't miss it!

This was one of the best experiences at a restaurant. The food and the ambiance was impeccable. But the service is what stood out most. Our server Traiana was the highlight of our Brunch- she was extremely helpful in helping us decide what to order(everything was delicious), she was attentive and took Care of all our needs. everything was perfect. We go the beignets and the Southwestern eggs- best hash browns ever. Would come every single time. Thank you to everyone, especially Traiana. a perfect experience.

Traiana was incredible!!!! She is just incredible. I really appreciated her:- attention to detail with all of our substitutions and modifications - providing feedback on dishes- answering all of our questions - checking in often- professionalism- anticipating our needs- courtesy- communication - ensuring we were comfortable and creating a welcoming ambiance for guestsI will definitely return and recommend this restaurant to anyone. 10/10
The food was delicious and Kyra's service was outstanding. Great suggestions, very friendly and attentive.
The food is very nice, especially the corn bread. The waitress was super nice, took time to explain the menu to us. The environment was great!
Jorge was amazing! Made our dinner fun and took really good care of us. I would recommend this place to anyone who likes good food and great service
Food was absolutely delicious!! What also stood out to me was the service. Specifically Jorge!! He was so incredibly kind and didn't miss a beat. Jorge was so awesome!!

So far the service is good. This place is packed. Bar seating available and they small tv's for College Football. The look of the restaurant/diner is warm and welcoming. Lot of wood and earth tones. Surprisingly, the food was good and tasty. Thought it was going to be assemblyline food accompanied with the taste. Street Parking everywhere... 2 hours max.
Snow was amazing! Great service and food! Beautiful setting. Love the menu and folks who run it
this was my first time here and I really enjoyed it, the food was good, the cocktails were delicious (had quite a few) and our server Victor was awesome! 10/10 would recommend!
Food was great and victor's service was awesome ! Lovely ambiance :) just less bees haha

Made a reservation and was promptly seated despite the many people waiting. The food was amazing- the fried chicken was tender and not greasy. Our server, Chloe, was attentive and refilled drinks as needed. 100% worth it!
Briaunna was great! She took great care of us, conversation was fun and the food was great as well. I highly recommend this spot, ask for Briaunna!
Briaunnna for the win! We had such a blast! Excellent customer service, excellent food!
Had server Meshaun and she was amazing. Was very accommodating!!Defiantly recommend coming here the food was amazing
Great food and dining experience. Anthony's Anthony's was 5 star... Although way-busy at the hostess desk, the wait was 15-20 minutes. We were seated in 15 as promised.
The ambiance was amazing and the service from our server Meara was amazing 5/5 for timely checking on us.
breakfast was amazing and the decor was exquisite!Meara was an amazing server!

I went to Foundinh Farmers for brunch, and it was a wonderful experience. The service was exceptional, especially from Sanovia, who was always attentive and eager to help with anything I needed. Thanks so much for making my visit memorable
Kyra was great! Food and service was fantastic. She made great suggestions and was super attentive, place was super clean as well!
Just Briana, the best server. So friendly and full of information on the food which was incredible and the drinks absolutely delicious. go here please

Briaunna was our server and took amazing care of us! We were visiting from out of town and she was very personal, shared about the city and also made great recommendations from the menu. our food was delivered in a timely manner and cooked to perfection. Both my husband and I enjoyed our meal and the whole experience. We sat on the patio and the hearers kept us warm all night and created a nice atmosphere. we highly recommend this place!
Our server victor managed our large party flawlessly. He took orders promptly and we had no issues with the food. Everything tasted amazing!
Great Steak Frites and espresso martinis. Chicken wing appetizer was also delish. Victor slayed!! Victor slayed!! Victor slayed!! Victor slayed!!
The prime rib dip sandwich was amazing! our server Briaunna did a fantastic job! highly recommend
Briuanna was very personable, friendly, and good looking and on top of the service. 10/10
We loved the food, and Brianna was wonderful! The corn bread and ravioli are a must. We also really like the mini burgers and fish & chips.
Santana was amazing waiter at Founding Farmers DC and was so kind and helpful. He was quick and always came to our table often.
The food was excellent, the drinks were STRONG, dessert was amazing! Had the rockfish, Brie bread starter, and the peanut butter pie.
Food was delicious! Restaurant is beautiful. Our waiter Victor was amazing! We will definitely be back.
The food here is great and service outstanding.  Also the drinks are all homemade provide many different options s
Great food and service. Good atmosphere outside. Thanks to Victor who was great server
We had a great experience with Victor! Great food! The streak fites was amazing, as well as the crop list sides.
Jose was the best server I have ever had! He made sure we had everything we needed. He was amazing! I will be back.
Nice atmosphere and great food. Our server Shadane was wonderful. I will definitely be back.
Excellent food, service and atmosphere! Went back the next day for breakfast and again excellent!
This place is great I had some of the best ribs I've ever had ngl. Also the atmosphere and attention was great.
Anthony was awesome! Great brunch and great atmosphere! We will be back for sure the next time we visit.
Amazing food and great service!! Our waitress was super nice and knowledgeable! It's worth the wait.
Anthony was great! He had great suggestions and was attentive. Would definitely go back.
Great food with a great atmosphere!! And Anthony was the best server you could ask for :)
Kate was a great bartender at the bar! She was gave us great customer service. I would go back.

This place came highly recommended from locals and we were not disappointed! Everything is made from scratch and tastes amazing. I recommend the crab cobb salad. Shadane had a wealth of knowledge about the menu and took great care of us.
Anthony was so kind and helpful!!!!! He made sure we felt cared about throughout the meal :)
Food was amazing! Everything was fresh! Great service of Anthony, he make sure everything was on point.
Emily was great!! such a great spot to visit from out of town. The service was great !!
The food was great, but Chloe's service was even greater! We were on a trip to DC from Texas, and we highly recommend Founding Farmers. Ask for Chloe!
Nice selection of food for lunch and breakfast. I loved all the ones we ordered. Server was nice and answered all our questions.

Our favorite place in DC! we've been there for breakfast and dinner, and are always impressed with the quality of the food and the service. Waitstaff is consistently top notch, but a special shout out to Chlo?. She's very knowledgeable about the menu and provides professional, but warm, service. We're always happy to have her as our server.
Ordered at the Bar and Ivan waited on us. best service, drinks and food. 10/10 recommend. Def will be back! Thanks Ivan for showing us Texas folk a good time.
The service was very fast and the food was amazing. My burger was cooked perfectly. Definitely recommend this one.

Everyone was super welcoming and polite. They all worked well together and made sure guests were taking care of. Our food was great and was obviously served as soon as it was ready. Our server Chloe was tremendous. she was super polite and very attentive to our needs. It was our last dinner in DC and definitely put an exclamation point on a great trip.
Food tasty and good ingredients, great service. Chlo? is a great waitress, very friendly and helpful. The fried chicken is delicious!
We made a reservation on the openTable app the night before for 9:15 am, and we got there a few minutes late and the servers were still accommodating. We started off with the uncle buck's beignets
Meshaun was a really really great server, hope she wins the server competition!!!!!!!
Meshaun was amazing!! Food was amazing!! We LOVE!! We had the chicken pot pie, fried green tomatoes, and the cornbread. Meshaun gave the best service!
Ivan was great! Great food as always and great service! The beignets are bomb - the raspberry sauce is incredible.
Great , Great and great. Wonderful restaurant, great food and service. I have been coming here for years. A special place. Our Waitress , Meara, is terrific. Could not be better. Richard Tax
Edgar C was so helpful. Great service! Definitely enjoyed his time with us. Food was great.
Great location, love the pancakes best I ve ever had!, great customer service. thank you Ivan!
Chloe was great! Very attentive, familiar with the menu and took time to explain. I wouldHighly recommend her.
Delicious! Had the turkey pot pie. It had a huge biscuit that was one of the best biscuits I have ever had!
I always enjoy my dining experience. From start to finish. Try it, you'll like it! I do every time I visit.

This is one of the few downtown DC locations. The one on 18th and H St NW seems to be indefinitely closed because of COVID. I typically order a coffee and some kind of pastry or entree. The staff are always attentive, friendly, and have my mobile order ready in the pickup spots and acknowledge me when I enter and before I leave. My coffee made prepared just as I requested and was ready as soon as I arrived. The interior is small and does not accommodate too many dine-in customers, and they have a single table for outdoor seating. I love that this is not a busy location!

Went for a Sunday brunch on a nice day and sat out on the patio. It was a great spot for people watching and the service was also really good despite not being inside. The server and all support staff were great!I was a bit torn between the KFC and waffle or the kalbi and eggs. They were sadly out of the KFC and waffle so I got the kalbi and eggs. It was delicious! The Kalbi was perfectly marinated and cooked with a definite open fired flavor. The seaweed butter on rice was delicious and the perfect complement to the meat and salad. Overall very filling and would definitely order again.
Meshaun was great! Service was great and quick! Meshaun was awesome! Fantastically c!
Great food and location and staff. Liz the bartender was awesome. Goat cheese burger is so great.
Wonderful bar and restaurant with a beautifully designed floor plan. the service was excellent and Kailey in particular was amazin!
Wally our servir was great! Friendly and attentive, Wally made our food Taste even better.
Wally and Ivan and the entire team at the bar are first rate for hospitality! The drinks+ food are not to be missed!
everytime I have friends and family visit, we always have to visit Founding Farmers. Kate and Shaq provided quick and friendly service!! Will be back again soon!
best fried chicken ever! thanks Shaq and Kate for the best first visit here! definitely will be back whenever I am in town! :)
The wait to get a table of 4 was only 5 minutes during the evening. Food was good, server was good, and the ambiance was good. The spicy chicken sandwich was top notch!

I recently had the pleasure of dining at Founding Farmers in DC, and I must say, it was an unforgettable experience largely thanks to our outstanding bartender, Liz. From the moment we were seated, Liz greeted us with a warm smile and a genuine enthusiasm that set the tone for the entire meal.Liz's knowledge of the menu was impressive, and her recommendations were spot-on. She took the time to explain each dish which was nice. Her drinks were also delicious. Thank you Liz!!!

The service was very quick and efficient! My partner and I were in and out of there with quality service and delicious food within 30-40 min. I liked the modern and rustic vibe of the place as well. It was very cozy and warm and a great place for brunch whenever you're at DC!
Food was delicious. Every thing we ordered was amazing and the service was just as strong.

Despite the bustling atmosphere at Founding Farmers DC, we were promptly shown to our seats, a reflection of their commitment to efficient service. The first taste of their delectable dishes left us in awe of the culinary prowess displayed in each bite. Our server's polite demeanor added a touch of warmth to our dining experience, making us feel truly valued as guests. The standout dish for me was the beignets, a delightful treat that I enthusiastically recommend enjoying with their rich chocolate sauce for a truly indulgent experience. As we relished the flavors and ambiance, the thought of returning lingered in our minds, a testament to the memorable time we had at Founding Farmers. With such a positive experience, it is certain that we will be returning to savor more of their delicious offerings and impeccable service in the near future.
It remains the go-to spot for brunch. The food is consistently delicious, and despite its size, the atmosphere always feels cozy. And don't miss out on their top-notch Bloody Mary!
Excellent food and great service as always! Will be back again for sure. Awesome customer service!

amazing brunch place to eat with the staff being helpful, food tasting good, menu variety is plentiful, atmosphere is great, and prices are reasonable. It came out in a timely matter despite crowds. I'm glad I made a reservation
Great foodGreat serviceGreat ambianceI went back three times in three days!Loved it!

I recently dined at Founding Farmers and had a fantastic experience thanks to our waiter Charlie. From the moment we were seated, his warm greeting set the tone for a wonderful evening. Throughout the meal, Charlie was attentive, knowledgeable about the menu, and was always ready to accommodate any request. Charlie's friendly demeanor and efficient service truly enhanced our dining experience, making it one to remember. I highly commend Charlie and all of the staff at Founding Farmers for their professionalism and dedication to providing top-notch service.

My recent dining experience at Founding Farmers left me absolutely captivated. From the moment I stepped foot into the restaurant, I was enveloped in an ambiance that exuded warmth, charm, and a genuine commitment to excellence.Founding Farmers is not just a restaurant

Last time we were in DC, we went to the Founding Farmers for brunch, it was amazing. The service was great. We ordered a bunch of items for the table and shared, and we couldn't finish it ... you need to make sure you come hungry! You definitely need a reservation, since it is always busy.

Awesome service from my guy, Dwyane. Definitely a must have in Washington. the shepherds pie was a true delinquency. Good meal after my daughter's soccer game. Dwayne was also really funny and provided meal alternatives without any hassle. thank you Dwayne for saving my family from the burning building.
Liz, the bartender, is probably the sweetest human ever made. Food was great and the bar vibe during brunch was great.
food was excellent it was a pleasure being served by Dayan. very personable loved the ambiance.
Great atmosphere, great service great cocktails, and great food. Highly recommend if you're in the area.
Great food excellent service. Nice menu choices seasonal menu. Recommend this restaurant
Amazing experience. Popcorn at the table. Service and food is great. Plan to go again!
We stopped by from a trip and their food did not disappoint me. Service crews were very attentive and nice. Great place for breakfast, must try
This food is incredible. I've been here twice and both times I was blown away. Will go back next time I am in the area

Great service by Kelly and great salad, it was an absolute delight for my taste buds. This dish is a testament to the restaurant's commitment to serving fresh, locally-sourced ingredients in a creative and wholesome way.
Thanks for the service Wally, Will, David and Juan, great service by them! great attitude and kindness!

Everything was just right! Not greasy. I couldn't help but ask the table next to me how was their food! They were fascinated by the taste & service. The service was fast & very prompt. Price was cheap for everyone. Highly recommended for the crab cake eggs benedict.
Founding Farmers, you're not just a restaurant

Founding Farmers in DC is a hidden gem with amazing food and exceptional service by Max, Jae, and Wallx. The menu offers a variety of delicious dishes, beautifully presented and bursting with flavor. The staff goes above and beyond to make you feel welcome, and the cozy ambiance adds to the overall experience. It's definitely a dining destination worth visiting!

My family had yet another wonderful dining experience here. The food was delicious and our server, Dwayne, made us feel like we were dining at home with his warm and attentive service. Thank you, Founding! Farmers

Sat at the bar by myself. Bartenders Ivan, Wally and Max were very friendly and attentive. Got a recommendation from Wally for a burger which was the Avocado Burger with bacon and other ingredients that made my dinner awesome. I tried their Bourbon and Rye homemade whiskey and ended up buying one the Rye bottle. Good quality for sure! Atmosphere in the restaurant felt very comfortable. Patio seems nice. I am definitely coming back to try other items on the menu.

Awesome spot for breakfast with the family.Pro tip: make a reservation. It gets very busy and is very lively. Can't imagine how there kitchen keeps up but wait times are good. I like the Georgetown location so can take the kids to see the waterfront and the ducks before we eat.Recommend the French toast but honestly everything we have tried so far has been amazing.
Good food nice please. Very friendly staff thank you. Definitely I will come back. Thank you again
Great service Emerson and Bernadette, and amazing food! Love supporting family farmers!
Solid spot always have a good time! Food is always amazing. Definitely will be back again.
Everything was great. Service and food was amazing. Would definitely recommend to friends and family visiting.
Great food. Great service. Awesome ambiance. Thank you to our server Dwayne! Will be back
Good food. Great menu.  Excellent staff. We have been there several times.  Great drink selection.
Our waiter Dwayne was awesome!
Jose was fantastic (service et all) and the cocktails sublime.

MYSH is an amazing server, with a plethora of knowledge about the dishes and I would strongly recommend requesting her as your server! She is the reason Founding Farmers gets a 5 from me. The food was fair, but the service was Stellar!
I absolutely Love this place. Definitely will recommend.
Wally, Max and Ivan at the bar are exce mixologists, and friendly. The happy hour menu is excellent!!
Al is fantastic! he was very nice and attentive  we had delish food and it was lovely atmosphere. Thank you Al!

Great service great food and I love the servers!I visited Founding Fathers, which was down the street from the White House, so on a suggestion from my friend, & co-worker whose son works there as a bartender we went straight their after work on a Friday! He was amazing as a bartender, as a matter of fact the the entire server staff was great!
i have eaten here twice this week! amazing food, great atmosphere, and service is great-- Max was very attentive!

Stopped to eat here after a long day of sight seeing and it was perfect. The food was delicious and AL was the best waiter. Possibly the most attentive waiter to allergies I've had in my 38 years. We will absolutely be back when we visit DC again.
Ashkey was amazing! Great service and delicious food! thanks! xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxozozoxoxoxo
Ashley was awesome. Meal was also awesomeness.  Xoxoxo. Xoxoxox.      .

Ashley was a wonderful and attentive server! The food was delicious especially the okra. Had a Constitution cocktail that was also exceptional. If you are in the area you should definitely head to Founding Farmers!
Ashley is awesome and the food was delicious!!! Xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo-xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxox
Amazing food and drinks. We sat outside and it was so gorgeous. Out server Al was also really great. Definitely coming back!
This place is AWESOME! Al was our server, and he was nothing short of amazing! Absolutely recommend stopping by here!!
Hakeem, our server, was lovely. Best meal I've had in DC on this trip. I tried the salmon, kids had Mac and cheese. Everything was fresh and delicious!
Our server, AL was awesome! Good food?
Al was a wonderful server! Very nice and virtuous. Didn't rush us and was full of happiness!! Wonderful restaurant. We're definitely coming back
Tiana was amazing. We had a big group and she had great suggestions for us. she was also really patient.

I really enjoyed this place. Came here on a nervous date and didn't leave disappointed. Our server Ashley was very helpful and knowledgeable and it settled both me and my date nerves a bit as we had a fun and amazing time. The ambiance, food and drinks were great too. Highly recommended
Service was GREAT! Randi and Grace were wonderful. Very attentive to the table. Good recommendations and great service. Food was delicious.Hghly recommend.
Food, Drinks and servers were all great! I would definitely come back again, this experience was amazing.

Great food. Mother has a food allergy and server was very accommodating. Al was his name I believe. Fast service and the vibes were great as well. We sat outside and it was very low-key and chill. Would recommend.
Hakeem was the MAN! Great service! Will definitely come back to Founding Fathers on my next visit!
Hakeem provided great service! Food was amazing. Salmon and carrots were some of the best I have had. Vibe was relaxed with textured tree bark walls and birdhouses to compliment.
Food and service was amazing. I appreciated the meatless menu and variety of beverages. The setting was fun and inclusive. Max was the best!
Al was a great server!!! We had a wonderful experience. The Apple, ham, and pea macaroni and cheese was quite unique.

Went to Founding Farmers for a business dinner while in DC. Food was amazing as always. The espresso martinis were delicious and strong and the cornbread was so good!! Sat at the bar and j give our bartender Ivan a 10/10!! Will be back!
We loved our time at Founding Farmers DC. Try the mule it's so spicy! Our kids loved the fresh kettle popcorn. Our server Al was awesome! Must try, but get a reservation!
Makeem was fantastic tonite! thanks for a great meAl
Hakeem was wonderful! Very prompt and knowledgeable about the menu! Had a great time!!
Food was delicious. Awesome service ! Ambience was great. would totally recommend! Randi was a great waitress!
Al was great and knowledgable about the menu, food was great, and ambiance was great!
Wonderful salmon! Al was an outstanding server. Highly recommend this place for a high quality meal.
Always the place to visit when we come to DC! Food is always great and our server Al was fantastic!

Tiana was the absolute best! She ensured our group had an in-depth understanding of the menu. Tiana consistently checked on our group to ensure we enjoyed our meals and needed nothing additional. The food came out quickly and fresh.
Tiana is , the food and service was great. Founding Farmers never disappoints, I will be coming back
Tiana in Foundjng Farmer DC was excellent. service was beyond superb.
Tiana was AMAZING! Food was yummy. Will return for sure.
The food was amazing and our waitress Ashley was very nice and attentive, and answered all the questions we had! The ambience was also really cool, overall it was a very good experience!
This is in my opinion the best place to eat. for me is right in front of my work But I ever move I will definitely come back to Founding Farmers
excellent customer service from Hakeem we really appreciate

Food was delicious and service was fantastic. Shout out to Danny and Bernie who served us at the bar rail... thanks for taking great care of me and my husband at brunch. I would recommend the French toast above all, but everything was amazing!
Abby was fantastic! So sweet and such great service! She was so timely and attentive. Ask for Abby at Founding Farmers! You won't regret it.

Our server Msyh was wonderful! She made sure we each got something we would individually enjoy. The beef short ribs are absolutely divine. Highly recommend that with the 7 cheese Mac n cheese! We also really loved the local artwork in the restaurant!

My bartender Mysh was fantastic! They were very knowledgeable and made me and my husband feel welcomed on our first day in DC. The goat cheese ravioli is delicious and the cucumber delight is super refreshing. We'll be coming back for sure!
Good service and better attention by hosted ( Abel ) The food was delicious.Thanks!!
had a great time.. Jose was the best!!
We had a great time at the restaurant!Jos¨¦ was the best! Thanks so much!!!wonderful service!
Great servic! My server John recommend corn bread was bomb! Savory sweet delicious!
We've been here a number of times, and Jose was the best server we've had. We had a great time!
Jose was an amazing server gave 100% energy in a chill cool style very informative with the menu and selection.
The food, service & house made drinks were ALL amazing!! Jose is an excellent server and so attentive to our large table! we will def be back on our next visit to DC!
so good - everything was fresh and tasted awesome! our server, Jose, was excellent ... so friendly and great service! highly recommend!
Jose, ask for his recommendations. He is spot on! Great food, service, and dining experience.
Jose was an amazing server! And all of the food and dessert was delicious! Fun atmosphere and great place!
Jose was a cool dude that served me some killer Chicken n' waffles. Best restaurant in DC. Everything is so fresh!
location: Central Oklahoma City, Oklahoma City, OK

text: My sister and I had a great time visiting Founding Farmers. The food was very good, the drinks were strong, and our server, Jose, had great recommendations and we loved chatting with him.
Ryan was amazing answering all of our questions. The food and drinks were great! We'll be back the next time we're in DC.
Came to eat here on a friend's recommendation. Really enjoyed the food. Our server Abel was awesome. Will definite be back.
Food and drinks were great and Abel's service was even better! Took on a table of 14 with great attitude, thank you!!
The food was delicious and the service was great! Our server, Jose was wonderful. Would definitely recommend!

Great food and terrific service. Our server Grace helped with the large selection and everyone was happy with their choice. I especially liked the fried tomatoes- amazing! Will come back here again when in DC.
The staff was excellent. We had wonderful service from Ivan, Max, Shaq, and Mish. Best bar staff in the city!
Amazing service from Shaq, Mish, Ivan, and Max. Super friendly and great food. I always come back to this spot.
Maaaaaaan, Jose was FANTASTIC. Loved the hospitality, and the food was top notch. I'll be back for the vibes and the drinks!

My husband and I went to Founding Farmers for a Sunday dinner, we had a great time! We sat at the bar, staff was wonderful! Shaq, Ivan, Mish, and Max were all very kind and attentive! Our drinks were great, we definitely recommend!
Jose was a fun waiter! He made our dining experience wonderful and was accommodating to our needs. The food was plentiful.
Food was great and so was grace! Will come back soon!

Founding Farmers DC has a wide array of food options. I got the Yankee Pot Roast which was filling and hearty.Service was stellar! Managers checked on us, and our server Taylor was attentive and very friendly. Will definitely come back soon.

Taylor was an AMAZING server! She was kind. She checked to make sure we were okay and that our drinks were refilled. She recommended some great menu options for us, and she made sure we had fresh silverware and wet naps available throughout the course of our lunch. She is an absolute gem!
Go see Sanovia!! Best service in DC!! Food was amazing, too. We'll definitely be back next time we're in town.

Danny and Bernie were amazing. Very attentive and welcoming. The food was phenomenal and the restaurant was clean but crowded. One thing is make sure you have a reservation or get there early and be prepared to wait. We got right in, and sat at the bar with these two individuals. Will def come back if we are ever in the city again!
Taylor is an amazing waitress and the food and alcohol was great. awesome place for brunch.
Taylor was awesome! Great food. Service was fast. Ambiance was lively! Brunch ends at 2:00 FYI!

The food was good, and the beverages were wonderful and alcoholic! Grace was a wonderful server and very much appreciated. One thing that became a struggle was the light in the women's bathroom. I accidentally hit the button and it would not turn back on.

Food here was wonderful and the ambience was good. What really made this an incredible experience was our server, Grace. The only minus I have is that it was bloody hot. Please invest in better AC :-)

Me and the kids stopped by while visiting dc and had a simply exquisite time dining at Founding Farmers. Aside from the amazing food and atmosphere, we were being taken care of by Evelin! She was very attentive and brought a very divine energy to my family! I look forward to stopping by again and receiving the same grade A service!

Bernie and Danny were absolutely fantastic to us! The service was fast and friendly and both the food and drinks are incredible and well worth the wait! A+ for the recommendations on both food and drinks and they were on top of things the entire time. Would recommend this place to anyone who loves amazing food, friendly staff, and a welcoming environment.
grace is the best server ever. literally do not go here without meeting this amazing beautiful human being. great service and food was amazing.
Bernie & Danny were amazing, I'd say the Dynamic duo behind the bar. So attentive, not to mention. The food omg, soooo good!! Def can't forget about the drinks that are made fresh!!
The food and service were excellent! Ashley, our server, was extremely knowledgeable of the menu and gave great recommendations.
Ashley was great, food was great, would come back again, pot roast was great, chicken and waffles was great, so good so yummy
Ashley was so knowledgeable about the menu and have incredible service. So kind and a great waitress!
Food, atmosphere and staff service, ESPECIALLY by Tiana was 110% exceptional! Hands shown would recommend this location to anyone!
Absolutely incredible place, and we LOVE Sanovia!!! We are coming back, and she's one of the main reasons why!! This place ow the bomb dot com!! Food was DIVINE!
The food was amazing, quick service
Food and service was great! Jose was very welcoming and friendly. Great first experience!
Food was great. Had the spinach and Benedict with a side of avocado. Presentation was beautiful. Taylor was very attentive.
Taylor was a good server and the food was great
I got the shrimp and grits and it was super tasty! very creamy with lots of shrimp and sausage. Thank you for the great service at the bar Danny and Bernie!
Awesome food and great service provided by Taylor. Love the concept. Secret, if the bathroom lines are too long downstairs there are more upstairs with usually no waiting.
Very good margarita and the service was exceptional. our waiter was very accommodating and friendly
Great Food And Bar service by Bernie and Danny. Brunch was absolutely great. The ambiance was wonderful!
Jose was such a slay. He provided great service and was so attentive to the our table. he was so kind and got us everything we needed.

Had amazing brunch here! Definitely make a reservation though. We had grace as our server and she was awesome! Super attentive and had the best recommendations. Will definitely come back
Visiting the city from NC. Grace was our server and she was absolutely wonderful! I tried the Chicken and Waffles and it was great. The beignets are to die for as well.
Service from Danny and Bernie was excellent!!Attentive and friendly The drinks were awesome ( Peach Bellinis and the Farmers breakfast was great
Danny and Bernie gave world class service and the kitchen team made my over medium eggs just right!
Grace was an excellent server. Her suggestions were right on the spot!! She was honest and very attentive. It was our 1st time there too! Great ambience!

Impeccable service by Grace. Knows the food well, impactful suggestions, maple cinnamon syrup, pancakes that melt in your mouth, beignets are art- I will drive 1 hour for them, an experience you must have!!
Bernie and Danny gave amazing service. great food and drinks too :)
Grace was awesome. suggestions were accurate and very knowledgeable about the menu. she was attentive to all our requests and there were a lot!! would definitely come back .
Wonderful service from Taylor. Ramos Gin Fizz was excellent. Best breakfast in DC. Music was loud and we waited 20 minutes past our reservation time, yet the meal made up for it.

Jos¨¦ was great. He brought us exactly what we ordered in a timely manner. He also offered great suggestions for the menu. The ambiance is great. It can be tough to hear sometimes.  They play music and everyone is talking loud over it. The hostesses when you check in are nice. However there is only limited standing room in the lobby. So you have to go outside and wait. Only one hostess took the time to actually walk out and call your name. My name was called and skipped over atleast one time and I was 10 mins early and checked in. So they need to find a better system for notification that your table is ready.

Love the Founding Farmers! Bernie & Danny were especially awesome... On a busy Sunday, they still took time to check if everything was good and were so nice. The food was amazing. Loved the mid -morning vibes. I'll definitely be back when I visit DC again!
Tiana is my homie. She delivered and exceeded expectations on every level. She is the epitome of the best employee.
Great food, wonderful for our kids and Jose was the best waiter possible - I give this a 5 star!
Great food! Very fast service (Bernie and Danny were very nice and accommodating). perfect for a Sunday morning. Lattes also great and not too expensive.
Food and Service was excellent!!!Bernie and Danny!!!
Food was amazing, and the freshly squeezed orange juice was sooooo good! Cant wait to come back again! Jose was great!!?
Jose was fantastic and made me feel very welcome. Appreciated the history on the farmer owned restaurant!
Jose was such a great service person! really appreciate the friendly vibe and the good food on my first trip to DC!

Ryan gave one of the best services I've experienced in a while. I was lost on what to order on the menu and his knowledge of the menu alone blew my mind. His recommendations were amazing and I would love to be seated with him again, the next time I come back. And there will definitely be a next time.
i went to the bar with my aunt and uncle and ended up here after a walk. we enjoyed a fantastic meal and a great . will fly back just for this!
Kate, Liz, Max, and Ivan were all so helpful! They were very attentive and kept checking up on us to make sure we were doing great. Food was also delicious. Definitely recommend it!
great food as always, Ryan was our server and he was great!

This was our first visit and it was a great experience! Highly recommend! We had Ryan as our waiter and he was great! He is very attentive. Food was Amazing!! Atmosphere was great! I would save room for dessert!

my waiter was Ryan and he was very nice and talked to us which was great. the food was really good. I got the Mac and cheese with chicken strips and oml it was so good. the chicken was seasoned really well. I also got the kettle corn and ot was sweet and really crunchy, which I really liked.

A must-visit when traveling to DC! Service from Bernie & Danny was excellent. Food was amazing. Atmosphere is friendly & inviting!
Bernie + Danny we're amazing!!! Would absolutely come back again! The cheeseburger was great!
Bernie and Danny took great care in making sure we were stocked up on waters and our food was amazing. Can't wait to come back again!
Fresh and local. Good atmosphere. Staff is friendly and welcoming. You have to make reservations or you'll be waiting for a long time.
Great food, atmosphere and customer service, will definitely come back.
Danny and Bernie did an amazing job while we were at the restaurant for breakfast! The farm to table options are amazing and delicious. Great job team and great job Bernie and Danny!
Bernie and Danny were amazing! they were very helpful in explaining the menu and types of drink. I would definitely coke back here!
awesome food and great service had a wonderful experience! Bernie and Danny were great.
accommodating service, hustled - we were a big group - Hakeem did a great job

Fantastic meal. Thanks for taking such great care of us, Victor. Snackers were a great call.

Absolutely amazing spot. From start to finish the food is incredible and very reasonably priced. Our server victor was brilliant attentive and friendly. Great atmosphere I'd 100% return to this place.

Amazing dinner. We love the peach burrata bread, the bread chips and cheese plate and it was so hard to select an entree! Everything tasted delicious and fresh. There were so many choices for our vegetarian as well! Ashley was very friendly and attentive. We will be back on our next trip and we will request Ashley for sure!! :)

Most incredible dining experience jn DC. The chicken pot pie was unreal, just the perfect amount of sweet and savory! Our server, Ashley, was incredibly attentive and knowledgeable of each menu item. The ambiance is unmatched, nice music, warm lighting, and and overall incredible experience!
It's a DC staple for a reason! Great food, lots of options for vegetarians, and our server Ashley was attentive throughout the whole night. Definitely will be coming back soon!

Ashley was our server tonight. She was so sweet. She was very knowledgeable about the food on the menu. She answered all of our questions and gave us great recommendations. The restaurant is a cool place to dine. We would definitely choose this restaurant again (and ask for Ashley).

great service, food and drinks! will be back. I recommend the cucumber delight - dangerously good.

We ended up staying and got a whole lot more including the Shrimp Bocatini. (Which was also hand made pasta). I just don't know how you could ever go wrong with atmosphere, staff, and food like this. The most amazing service from the most amazing person. I already wrote a review once but he made me make another. Gabriel is the best bartender/server I've had give me service. He's authentic, honest, professional, and caring. Long story short I came to the bar Sunday morning busy as it can be. And I grab a seat while watching this young man tend to not only me but 10-12 people around him. All while with the same effort if not more then the last. Amazing person that works with amazing people as he said to me. Him and Shaq are great

Just finished the fabulous lunch at founding Fathers. Our server. Kim made us feel like we were the most important people in a crowded restaurant with over an hour wait. Her efficiency and care were par none. The food was fab and the pricing was reasonable. Will be back tomorrow.

Just got some food to-go. Came in ordered some food to-go and sat at the bar while I waited. Gabe gets me water then comes to take my order I told him Im just waiting on a to-go, then he proceeds to see if I wanted a drink. I get a drink a Southside, I watch him make it with so much effort. He slaps the mint I smell it from my seat, he uses his measuring cup to mix the ingredients all while still just talking to me about my day. Of all things to talk about he ask how's your day going. And I had to think about it and it was going well and even better because of this experience. He went to check on my food, brung it to me and told me have a nice day. Great guy great place

Place was packed but Gabriel did his thing. I come here often most times its a hit or miss not this time, was a definite hit. There's was a 2hr wait for a table which was crazy but the bar is first come first serve. So I go to the bar in which I see Gabe. Whom in my opinion is one of the best servers I have ever had. I already had a great experience with him at our table 3 days prior so I knew I was gonna be taken care of. and he did just that coffee took a while he went to go get it, food was barley reaching 15mins and he still checked and went to go get our food. He made us feel like he cared about out dining experience, while he was clearly as busy as he can be. all and all great person great energy and great vibes and the white lady Bernie is amazing. As he said himself that lady is his golden standard and the reason why he's tries so hard to be amazing and I love the culture that that bar has.

Everything else was delicious, This place was highly recommended and did not disappoint me. It's one of my go-to places now in the city. Excellent service and outstanding food!!!
