i love Jinya Ramen Bar!!! we had the best experience and the food is truly phenomenal. Natalie is the best!!!

If you're not i to waiting in long DC lines and want a strong cocktail to accompany a delicious bowl of ramen, this is your place. Every time I get over to Logan Circle this is my first stop. They have plenty of seating upstairs, downstairs and at the bar. If you happen to get a table ask for Darwin, he's our favorite. Not only is he fast and efficient, his personality lights up the room

Can't think of the last time I went some place and literally everything I ordered was great.Ambiance: I enjoyed that they yelled the "Irasshaimase". The restaurant has a lively vibe but it's actually not too loud. I could hear my friend very easily. Well lit (but not too well) modern place that's great for a night out with friends or a date. Floors clean. Music also lively but not overbearing. Food: Edamame, takoyaki, crispy chicken (highly recommend), impossible bun, salmon poke tacos. 10/10 just all around great.Service: We had a 5 min wait, but we were called faster. The hostess was super polite and took us quickly. Our server was someone named Joseph. He was also very polite and efficiently cleared everything and was just generally on the ball. Have to go back and try the ramen here someday. Really appreciate that they have lower calorieand veg options that *taste good*!
Ramen was excellent! Andreas was diligent in checking in on our experience here and so far has been a very satisfying visit to the restaurant. Service was on point.
This place was the best!!Our sever Nicole was very nice and was very energizing. She was very quick with our food as well! Best ramen restaurant in DC and parking was so easy!
Great food and amazing service! And our waiter Nicole was great! I got the Chicken Wonton Ramen and it was superb! Totally recommend if your in DC

Daniel was my server for the day. He was phenomenal in helping me with everything I needed! including telling me about menu items I hadn't thought about but was so excited he told me about them! Please come down and try the food, sake and starters! very delish!

Went on a Monday afternoon, party of 7. Street parking only. The place is nice and clean. More tables upstairs. Food ordered: Spicy Umami Miso Ramen, JINYA Tonkotsu Original 2010*, Yuzu Shio Delight, JINYA Tonkotsu Black, JINYA Chicken Ramen, Pork Gyoza, JINYA Bun, Spicy Creamy Shrimp TempuraThank you!

I recommend everyone to try this place. The food was great and the service was amazing. The attention to detail is what stood out at this restaurant. DARWIN WAS AMAZING!! the restaurant was kinda busy, they had alot of to-go orders (i could see them lining up) and i never felt like the service was lacking. i just stopped in for a drink and app, but the experience was great, felt very welcome, food and drinks were 10/10 and came quickly. would definitely recommend.

so great. service was great. muchas gracias. nicole was great.

nicole was great! very attentive waiter and super sweet. food was 10/10. great experience
so good. drinks are delicious. I've had two drinks so far and they've both been amazing.
Amazing service and food. There was a good ambiance and the server Nicole was super kind and attentive.
Very fast service and great menu! It's not a huge offering but it's very easy to customize your order! Our waitress Camilla was great :)
Daniel was fantastic! We had a great time!
a true staple for a cozy ramen meal on 14th. thanks so much to our supper sweet server Michelle!

Excellent Service provided by Nicole tonight followed up by an exquisite Ramen Bowl that my partner and I we're looking forward to all day. Will definitely be back! If you're ever here definitely ask for Nicole she will make your experience an unforgettable one.

Once you walk in you're received by the great hostess I was welcomed and attended by Magaly and she showed great hospitality and was very kind,now the food it was delicious the spicy chicken ramen which I highly recommend,overall i was attended very well and recommended for a local spot to eat

Came in on a cold Monday night, was seated upstairs it was packed but my server Camila took care of us quick! Apps were great! Couldn't decide on drinks and the server in the back named Andres was running a sake bottle we asked and he recommended a sweet and creamy sake it was so good! Will def come back again

JINYA Ramen Bar is my favorite spots to visit when I'm in Washington DC! When I first visited, I was just learning about Ramen and what to order. Andres was so knowledgeable and attentive and helped me in finding out what I'd like. Thank you! Cannot wait to visit again

I have been to this restaurant several times and each time it doesn't disappoint. Our waiter Andres was wonderful and attentive. I highly recommend trying their impossible gyozas and spicy creamy ramen. Their drinks are also incredibly tasty!
Delicious vegan ramen! Great energy! Andre's is amazing!Dope server! Love it here def comin back.
Great service! our waiter was Natalie she was so kind and attentive. I went with the spicy chicken ramen! it was 10/10 as well as the creamy shrimp tempura, so fresh and delicious

Another great experience at JINYA. The food is consistently delicious and with the incredible manager Sergei at the helm making everyone feel welcome this is a place you'll want to come back to time and time again!
The best Ramen place in Washington DC. I am hooked. I go every weekend.

When you go to bar ask for Danny or Zahara. He or she will make sure your good and will take good care of you. Drinks were amazing and food was fantastic. They are really cool people and take care of you.
Justin, our server, was incredibly helpful and the food was really good! It was a quick turnaround time.
The food was amazing, and the service was fantastic. Definitely 10 out of 10 would recommend!
This was fantastic ramen!! So yummy. Carlos at the bar was the best. Highly recommended.

Good ramen with lots of different options you don't normally find. Spicy creamy vegan ramen was a particular highlight, the broth was smooth as silk. The buttery corn small plate was phenomenal as well, good service by Darwin our server as well!
Authentic and delicious ramen ! We love the wonton chicken ramen. Darwin was great server great vibes.
Food is delicious and Carlos was great!
We had a wonderful experience at Jinya ramen - perfect for a cold day! Darwin was a wonderful server and the staff was super friendly. We'll definitely be back!
Stopped here on the way to meet a friend to grab some dinner, and man. That was dangerously good. If I worked near here I'd eat here all the time!
Honestly their veggie ramen is the best one I've had. All of their dishes are great but their hearty veggie ramen is the best one I've tried. This is coming from someone whose been to Japan twice.
Excellent food and service from Natalie! The spicy ramen was delicious! I would recommend adding the shrimp wontons.

I live a short distance from the Jinya in Mosaic, but I always always always opt to go to the location in DC. Chris Nguyen was literally the nicest person one of the times I popped in and that solidified my loyalty to this location. Very gracious, friendly, personable. You can tell how much of himself he puts into his work. Not to mention, the food is fantastic, never any mistakes that I've had to deal with. Overall just a top-notch location.

I love coming here! The food is amazing. The drinks are great too. The staff and Mangement couldn't be more friendly and accommodating. I eat out often and other restaurants could learn a lot from this place. I'll look forward to my return.
Carlos and Daniel are the best! Foods amazing! Their happy hour goes till 7pm. Go upstairs.
Wendy was a great server and the food here is great.
Yummy. Fun. Noodles, b1tch. Get into it. The homie Darwin held us down. It's a vibe. Eat here.
The ramen is tasty and well priced. The service is friendly and efficient. Would recommend. Two thumbs up.

Darwin was hands down the greatest waiter I've had the pleasure of meeting. He was extremely knowledgeable about the entire menu and gave great advice. Everything came out correctly and quickly. Not to mention the food was delicious. Great spot
Darwin was a great waiter and super helpful and kind! Love the ramen here every time I come.
This is one of my go to ramen restaurants in DC. The prices and portions are amazing and the staff are extremely kind.
Food is great!! Drinks were spot on! My server Nicole was amazing! Huge fan of the takoyaki!! Will definitely be recommending to friends and coming again!

I was there yesterday with a friend, and we received excellent service and recommendations from Daniel. I ordered a vegan ramen, and Daniel helped me to customize it by adding chicken. He also prepared some mock-tails with hibiscus that were really good!
Dinner at this ramen bar was super delicious! I will definitely come back and see Chris!

It's a great experience. The ambiance is very welcoming and charming. Amazing whiskeys, food and service. The bartenders sean, carlos and keith are extremely knowledgeable and make great recommendations.

I love going to Jinya. Great ramen, amazing service. Shout out Natalie!
The food was great and service was fast helpful. The tonkotsu spicy was very good. The Jinya bun was very flavorful. I always try the bao whenever they have it.
Amazing food and awesome service! One of their managers, Chris, went out of his way to make sure we were having a great evening. Highly recommend and can't wait to come back!
Great place to eat great ramen!Our server was super helpful!The vibes are immaculate!

Always an amazing place to come for food or drinks, been coming here for years and never had a bad experience.Chris & Sergei run the place like champs and you'll probably have the fastest service you've ever seen.Plus they look mighty fine while doing it.
The food there was really good! love the portions that was given. Amazing service from the staff.
Chris did a wonderful job with this restaurant! Food was amazing!
i ate here and the manager Chris was so nice! service was amazing and the food was delicious. not to mention the inside was so pretty and i loved the vibe

Jinya is an amazing place! The first time I went there I had an amazing experience. Chris and Daniel are fantastic, and the other staff treated us very well. I loved the many flavors available and the appetizers are amazing (love the gyozas!!!!!!!) I can't recommend this place enough.
Food was great and service was impeccable. Thank you Chris and Daniel for taking care of me.
location: Greater Upper Marlboro, Upper Marlboro, MD

text: One of my favorite Ramen place to go to. And most importantly the services here is amazing. Daniel is the best bartender! Good vibes!

Stopped by for ramen and had a very warm welcoming by the hostess Brenda! My server Zahara was very attentive, checking in us frequently. She recommended me the Tonkotsu black ramen with the 6pc pork gyozas. Best combination ever! Will definitely be coming back soon!
Such a treat for a rainy day! Highly recommend if you're craving Ramen. Our server Natalie is the best!

Best Ramen in DC!!! Definitely will be coming back the vibe is amazing I especially enjoyed the music. Service was also outstanding my server Alondra was very attentive and had great recommendations when I let her know that I was vegan, she highly recommended the Fly Vegan with a impossible bun a very must try combo!!

I was welcomed by the hostess magaly, lesly they made us feel very welcomed. I received a very good service from Keith, excellent bartender. Made me and my friends very delicious drinks. Food was delicious as well. Will make sure to tell people about this amazing place such a great experience we got.

Had a great time, was greeted by manager Andy, who gladly took in my request to sit upstairs. Then we followed the hostess Brenda that took us upstairs as we requested to the manger Andy. From there the service from Natalie was amazing she recommended the Spicy Creamy Shrimp Tempura which was delicious. Definitely coming back again had such a great experience.
Went there the other day, probably the best drinks I've ever had in DC, the bartender keith was the best
Yo Keith and Carlos were so amazing. And he food was out of this world. I'll definitely be back when I return to DC.
Highly recommend this place!! Zahara was wonderful and made my first visit amazing!! thank you so much!!

Came in and sat at the bar and was immediately welcomed. Good and fast service. This location also has a lm upstairs. Got my usual the spicy creamy vegan and it hit the spot just as expected. Keith and Carlos, behind the bar, were 2 of the best.
the food was amazing definitely coming back and our bartender carlos and keith was amazing definitely recommend this place
Keith and Carlos are great! They made our experience amazing!
great spot for ramen! ask for Carlos!
Carlos makes the best drinks!! This place will make you feel welcome and the food is amazing.
Carlitos was an amazing bartender! Great service and even better drinks! Love the 14th st jinya
Great service and food! Natalie was a great server and had fantastic service throughout our meal!

This place is awesome. The food is great! The service is awesome as well. The whole staff is great. (Special shout out to Carlos and Keith!!) Went on a Sunday by myself, I was quickly acknowledged, greeted and seated. My food tasted so good! The manager, was also awesome, he made sure everyone was well taken care of, he was attentive and was quick to refill your water if you were out. I will definitely be back. !!

Exceptional ramen, extremely fast service, phenomenal team! Carlos hosted me at the bar and gave me a warm welcome and made a fantastic Bloody Mary that was perfectly spicy. The Ramen bowl was a vegan, veggie bowl that was delicious and not too salty. Great mix of vegan and meat options for all diets. 100% recommend and look forward to returning!

The customer service was impecccable, Natalie was our server and she did a great job. I wasn't without water for more than a minute before she came and helped us out. The ramen was great and the appetizers were also delectable. First time coming but I would definitely recommend it to someone who likes Ramen.

absolutely love Jinya this is my second time coming in like a week! it's delicious everytime spicy chicken Ramen and crispy rice w/ tuna is perfect everytime highly recommend

So accommodating and very efficient! The food is delicious!!! Our waitress was Natalie and she is the best!!!
Andreas was great enjoyed the spicy chicken ramen. also got the mango whiskey drink it did what it was supposed to do

Carlos and Daniel were great! This is my first time going and I was very impressed not only by the ambiance but by the service and the tastiness of this place! Will definitely be returning and recommending to friends and family

Joseph passes the vibe checked every time. Great service and constant check-ups with table and drinks. Thank you!
Food is 5 stars! Service is even better! Shoutout to the bartender Daniel for great service and recommendations! Will def come back and recommend to all!
Great service and staff!!! The food is very good and my top restaurant. I recommend this place

Excellent service, and good food. The wait wasn't very long, and our waiter was very nice and gave us good dessert.
Fantastic ramen, excellent service, and great drinks! I've been to several ramen restaurants in DC and Los Angeles and Jinya is among the best.
Daniel provided great service!!
Great customer service and even better food!!!! I ordered the Miso Ramen and it was very good.
Andres is so amazing and kind and the food was great . I'm definitely coming back.
The food was really good and the server Andres was really helpful and friendly .
Andres- the ramen is so flavorful and the server was very helpful.

I am a loyal customer to Jinya, I stand by my statement that they have the best Ramen. Although I've been to multiple Jinya locations, the Washington, DC location is my favorite. Excellent service and great food! My last experience was exceptional. The bartender Carlos made me a great Manhattan cocktail based off of my drink preference. He provided excellent customer service and was an overall joy to converse with. The atmosphere is great and the food comes out super fast which is convenience when you're hungry. I would recommend Jinya Ramen to anyone, 10/10 recommend for great food and an unforgettable experience. The Spicy Creamy vegan is my go to dish here.
Our server Raquel was amazing!! Great food and great service!!
Drove 6 hours for this. Jinya rocks and so does Carlos

Great ramen! Both got Tonkotsu Black. The pork broth was unmatched. Really enjoyed our experience. Andres was an awesome waiter- attentive and professional. Great atmosphere and nice seating. Will definitely be coming back next time we're in the area.
Really delicious! Camila served us and she was great and attentative. Ramen is expensive, but here it is worth it!!
Best Ramen in DC!! Happy hour 7 days a week! Brunch is best way to have a full JINYA experience! High volume place with attentive service and refreshing drinks! Fun and busy ambiance. Arigato!

Jinya is the best place to go and eat when it's a rainy and cold day outside. Make sure you check this place out. Great customer service and the manager definitely made us feel welcomed! Thank you so much Sergii we really appreciate the hospitality. You earned the 5 stars
Delicious gluten free ramen appreciated the service from Carlos and the knowledge he had about the menu.
It Was a fantastic experience! 10/10 would recommend! Atmosphere was great, food was great, service was... good enough! ^_^
location: Central Oklahoma City, Oklahoma City, OK

text: Had reserved a space for our friends birthday, had our own private room and everything with a window to the bar it was awesome. Carlos was our bartender and he made sure we got all the drinks we could want. Carlos youre the man my guy.

Jinya is by far one of my favorite spots in DC, not only because their ramen is amazing but what makes the spot truly great is their incredible staff-- especially Carlos! Carlos has always made me feel taken care of and is also a joy to talk to. He's the best bartender on 14th in my opinion, especially on the nights I haven't known what I wanted, or wanted to try something new

Had a wonderful experience at JINYA ramen bar, Thanks to the great help of Keith and Carlos they made me some of the best drinks have (Leache Tene) wonderful and well rounded drink. the best ramen I've had in DC. The spicy chicken soup (Spicy) was great. The service and food was amazing, I recommend it, you have to try it.
Best Ramen in DC!! Happy hour 7 days a week! Brunch is best way to have a full JINYA experience! High volume place with attentive service and refreshing drinks! Arigato!

Spicy creamy vegan is my fix. This ramen is my favorite and I always go back for it to JINYA! They did such an amazing work on this recipe, the umami flavors are everything. You might think it is not a first choice for ramen, but it's so delicious and definitely my favorite! We had edamame, spicy tuna tacos and panna cotta desserts. Everything was super delicious and the service was super. Our server Debs really knows her etiquette and the manager was very hospitable as well. I can recommend this spot to everyone and I am definitely coming back!
Ate here once with a friend shortly after their grand opening. Awesome food & ambiance. This is a great spot to take a 1st date in my opinion - specifically the 2nd floor level.
Always come here for the happy hour. Chris is super helpful when it comes to food suggestions and pokemon go tips.
Everything is on par. A good ramen bar that lets you stretch out and relax. Nataly the server is awesome! Really enjoyed her harrowing stories of growing up in P.G. She is a real survivor.
The different flavors are amazing! A great place for my small family of four. The service was great too!

Excellent service and food. Had poke which was excellent and wonton excellent as was the Ramen pork.

This is my absolute favorite ramen place to go to in the area! It's not too far from Laurel and I can get my grub on! Five Star reviews thanks to the wonderful service given by Courtney! Really, if you can, request for HER to serve you. She's the best!

Yet another fantastic meal made even better by superior, friendly service from Kevin T! Go-to is usually the Sprouted Up Ramen, but enjoyed the new California Poke Bowl tonight. Delish! Will be back again soon.
The food here is phenomenal - I've never had anything like this before. I recommend the jinya buns to start, followed by a beef and rice bowl. Amazing!!
Ming was a very nice waitress and helped us have a fantastic experience! The food was truly delicious, would recommend to all.

Very tasty ramen at reasonable price. Ming was the server for the table, she was able to describe and recommend a few choices from the menu. Ford and service were great, would definitely come back again. Highly recommended!!
Yumminess in a Jinya bow! Ming's customer service is superb! Very personable and accommodating.Checked on us more than thrice and we appreciate it.

Food was really good and service was great. The simple menu made it easy to navigate and find what I wanted to eat. I didn't even have to wait long to be seated. Irena was an excellent server. Would definitely recommend!
The food was amazing and service was incredible. Ming was our server and was honestly the nicest and most attentive server I've ever had. I whole heartedly recommend this place.
Ramen was great! Good portions and our server Ming was literally the nicest server I've ever had.

Irrashai! As a DC ramen enthusiast/addict, my ramen feelings run deep and opinionated. JINYA consistently exceeds all expectations when it comes to flavor, consistency, noodle thickness, toppings, seasoned egg perfection, ambiance and service. My go to on this menu is the creamy spicy vegan and trust me, it is heaven on earth. The best part? Having it served by my man, Kevin T. He is no doubt the highlight of my weekend. Personable and all knowing about ramen, he is the perfect guide for the best ramen in DC.
Every Sunday, Kevin T. hooks me up with a creamy spicy vegan ramen bowl. Every Sunday I am pleased to no end. No Ramen No Life!!
Kevin Tran was a fabulous server and his recommendations were perfect. The spicy tuna taco appetizer was delicious as well as the spicy chicken ramen bowl.
So flavorful and yum!!!!! My server Kevin T was the best and complimented my purse as soon as I walked in. 10/10 would recommend. Also get the octopus balls
Never had Ramen before and I loved it! Pork gyoza and the Pork Garlic Chef Special. So delicious!

Helen andJonathan were great. The food is amazing. Gotta try there limited time only garlic chefs special, so amazing. The restaurant environment is very nice and clean. The attached picture proves how good it was!
Awesome ramen house. By far the best in DC. I recommend stopping by. The chefs special is worth the try no matter what is on the menu.
Great food! Ming was awesome! Old Skool Ramen and Chicken Chashu Bowl were excellent. Much try if you come to the DC area!
Excellent service and food

I personally prefer this place over sakuramen. It is less 'authentic' in that it is less soy-based and more creamy?, but it suited my palate better. The spicy tonkotsu ramen is simply amazing, and the chashu is very tender. Would recommend for anyone craving some ramen. The place is very large, so even better that the wait times usually don't get too long!

The spicy chicken ramen and tonkotsu ramen was amazing with lots of toppings that could be added - perfect for someone who doesn't eat pork. Service was fast and nice! We came around 9pm and didn't have a wait. Marinelle is the best server #sendnoods
Really great food! Loved the ramen and the spicy shrimp tempura!y kid loved the kids meal as well! Our server Kevin Tran was very helpful and very kind! Thank you!
Fun cocktails, amazing service (Kevin Tran) and fab food. Try the gyoza and "slurp it up cilantro" - the best!

This is quite possibly the best spicy chicken Ramen I have had. The balance between the creamy texture and the pepper is superb. Marinelle was fantastic, she made sure that this was a memorable experience. We will certainly be returning the next time we are in the area!

My husband and I are in Washington DC visiting. We ate here for dinner and loved it! The food was so full of flavor and our waitress, Marinell, was just wonderful! They even have extra noodles for your leftover ramen. So glad we picked this restaurant. Highly recommend.
Kevin was our server and he was great! He gave us the 411 on the staples and ensured we had full waters and full bellies. Ramen was sooo good. I got the Cha Cha Cha - so good!
The service here is always prompt and courteous. Ramen is fresh. As one of the few in the growing ramen scene, I'd say to check it out.

JINYA Ramen Bar is honestly the best ramen bar i have ever been to, and the waitress, Irena had been incredibly nice to me and made sure i was satisfied with my food, and my overall stay at this wonderful restaurant.

what an amazing experience down to the last piece of ice water. as seen with the pictures attached you can tell the care put into the last bit of food. i would recommend getting the vegan broth and adding meat into it ( personal choice the beef) and it will taste amazing. you can tell every employee that steps into the restaurant cares and i will definitely be back! shoutouts to marinelle, jonathan, & chris for being the best and making me want to come back just for them!!!!
This ramen bar is absolutely amazing! Jonathan, our server, was very attentive and accommodating. If you are looking for a fun and delicious lunch, look no further!!!

The service at Jinya was amazing! The food is delicious and Jonathan was extremely helpful. I highly recommend eating here when in the DC area. If you dont, you will experience high amounts of FOMO. GO! GO! GO!

This was my first time trying ramen and I wasn't disappointed! It was so delicious, and so were the pork buns! I also loved the bottomless mimosas. Great brunch menu! Irena was a great waitress as well!
Get their Cha Cha Cha Ramen and you won't be disappointed!! Great ambiance and even better staff and ramen!!

Outstanding food, service, and vibe. I went here with my GF for NYE. Amazing food, amazing drinks, fantastic service, and I danced the night away.I'd love to come here for lunch and see what the vibe is like. A little on the pricey side but considering its location and food, it's worth a visit.
Best kitchen I've ever tried. Salmon with avocado salad is amazing. Stuff is very friendly. Special thanks for manager Sergi. Thank you Jinya I had a good time!

THE BEST RAMEN PLACE IN DC!!!! The host are extremely nice, the service was great. Since I am vegetarian I ordered the Spicy Creamy Vegan which was delicious. The manger even came over and interacted with us.

This place is so amazing, the host are really nice Janaya and Shaconya helped me and my family to our seat immediately. The server Zipporah greeted us in a timely fashion and was also very nice. I recommed getting the Jinya Tonkotsu Black add garlic and the Sweet Potatoe Fries. I will be returning :)

My first experience at Jinya Ramen Bar in Washington DC was amazing and great. The food is very good and staff is extremely friendly and receptive to your needs! The service was quick. I had the Jinya chicken. You can add extra toppings to your Ramen- I had corn and broccoli and this tasted incredibly good. Also the interior of the restaurant is nice and they have a supernice spot outside to eat your Ramen there. If you're craving Ramen it's definitely worth to visit.

I found where failed employees of chicken filet works, they tend bar at this unfriendly. The bartender at 3:30 was without a doubt the rudest, non edsion bulb on the block. sexist and clueless.simple as that. i was with four women and watched three quaters of the michigan-ohio state game. they abruptly turned it off to accomodate a new table of men to watch Alabama-auburn. we complained. robbie the clueless and sexist manager dd nothing.avoid this place!!!!
so gross food nasty rat droppings all over the place

This was such a terrible experience! Before we went to the restaurant I went on yelp and saw it had great reviews and even during the whole pandemic it had great reviews but the food was gross . There's literally no other way to say it. First off we didn't even have a full menu online they had the full menu and they handed us the kick off menu ? When there wasn't even a game ? I ordered the buffalo chicken flatbread and it was just soaked in buffalo sauce, every single bite was just sauce no indication of there being ANY chicken . So I paid 15$ to get sauce on bread? The two barely there pieces of chicken I did see had sort of half the breading on and the other half didn't which was unappetizing. the only reason we didn't cause a scene was because our waitress was a lovely woman and it wasn't her fault. I'm just disappointed that such a highly reviewed restaurant could give up this easily on trying still. For dc you'd think the expectations they set for themselves would be higher
$25 for a White Russian was absolutely ridiculous and service wasn't great to warrant price.

We went in on a Saturday night at 10:30. We were told that there were no tables. (There was about 10 empty tables) they told us that the 2 servers had 20 tables and they were too overwhelmed to take anymore...

This was my first time there. I like that it was a sports bar. And i liked the feel. However, between the service and the quality of food, it was a total fail. I am glad the manager discounted the check but 2 of my friends didn't even eat their meals. My burger was under cooked. Also, the wait to get the food was crazy. I understand that they were busy but people were getting their food who had sat after us. Maybe it was just a bad day, i don't know. They are a new bar, so they are probably just working things out in the kitchen. It will probably get better as time goes by.
3 stars is appropriate. Fun place to watch sports. Food is fine for sports bar food.
Atmosphere was nice. It was a little loud and the food was on the pricier side. But I would go again!
Crab dip was very good, Brunch entrees limited and not the most tasty. Would not recommend the Short Rib Hash, or the french toast. Bottomless mimosas were as to be expected and service was good.
The food was just ok. The decor is nice, but there's nothing special about the menu. I probably won't go back.

A good bar downtown that tends to get crowded (like most bars in the area) the food options are ok but nothing to write home about. In the warmer temperature months, they open the bar front windows which is pretty cool. Good for larger groups and a back bar for private parties.
Food was delicious & service was great! We enjoyed the cocktails as well. Well done!
Very good food here will come back i had a burger which was very good and the drinks were good too

We really enjoyed this place. They had music on Friday during happy hour. Drinks were reasonably priced during happy hour. Burgers were great. Fries were good. Service was great. I would definitely recommend this place.

Came here for a party, there were some small hiccups with food not being ready at the same time, but I won't penalize the restaurant for that due to our large group size. Food was good and came out hot. Fries were very well seasoned and crunchy. Would highly recommend this restaurant.

I'm so glad I went there first!!! Service was incredible and very knowledgeable. The cocktail list blew my mind with interesting ingredients and combinations, very happily surprised. And sitting at the bar was easily the best choice, so much to see, hear and absorb!
Stopped by this new DC spot located at the corner of K and 21st Streets, NW. The vibe was very cool, drinks flowed well up front

Proper 21 in Washington, DC, truly exceeded all expectations during one of the busiest weeks imaginable. Despite the inauguration frenzy, their wonderfully attentive staff and exceptional food and drinks delivered an unforgettable experience. We visited twice: first during President Trump's victory rally and again to watch the inauguration. Both times, we were blown away.The manager, Eric, was warm, inviting, and attentive, setting the tone for exceptional service. Executive Chef Felipe went above and beyond, stepping out of the kitchen to seat guests and even serve drinks when the rest of the staff couldn't make it due to the weather. His leadership and dedication were inspiring, and the food he prepared was absolutely phenomenal.On Monday, we were fortunate to have Heidi as our server. Called in to help during an incredibly crowded day, she managed to shine under the pressure. Her professionalism and friendly demeanor made the experience seamless. The drinks she served were crafted to perfection, adding to the overall excellence of the experience.What amazed us most was how the staff remembered our names the next day--it's rare to find such personal touches in such a bustling environment. Proper 21 turned a busy, weather-challenged inauguration weekend into a warm and welcoming experience. With its exceptional food, perfectly mixed drinks, and extraordinary service, we can't wait to return!

It's been one of those days--meetings, emails, endless back-and-forth. So, I decide to take a break and drop into Proper 21 for a little solo escape. The place is right in the heart of Downtown DC, and I've heard a lot about it. I need somewhere to unwind, but also somewhere that feels a little different than the usual spots.As soon as I step in, I feel the energy. The vibe is loud, but in a good way--almost like being in a club but with the comfort of a great bar. There's a mix of people all enjoying the night, laughing, chatting, and the music's just right. Not too overbearing, just enough to create that lively buzz.I make my way to the bar, and the bartender greets me right away. I'm in the mood for something easy, so I go for a cider on draft. It's crisp and refreshing--exactly what I need. While I'm sipping, the bartender recommends the smash burger. I'm not sure what's so special about it, but I figure why not go with it? I also grab some wings--buffalo and gold rush. People around here seem to love those flavors, and I'm not one to pass up on a good recommendation.The place is busy but not overwhelming. It's got this clean, sleek feel, and the TVs around the bar are showing some game. I catch a few highlights, but honestly, I'm more interested in the food. The wings come out first, and I dig in. The buffalo ones have that perfect balance of heat and tang, but the gold rush wings? They're a game changer--spicy, yes, but packed with flavor. I'm hooked.As I'm finishing the wings, I hear a conversation a few stools down. Someone's raving about the service here, specifically about a bartender named Diana. They're talking about how she turned their night around after another restaurant messed up their reservation. That sounds pretty impressive, I think. I can definitely see how someone could feel taken care of here. The staff is friendly, and everything flows smoothly.The smash burger comes next. It's juicy, flavorful, and honestly, it's one of the best burgers I've had in a while. The fries are perfectly crispy, not soggy, and seasoned just right. The whole meal comes together perfectly. I start to relax, feeling the weight of the day lift off my shoulders.But as the night goes on, I realize I'm not ready to call it a night just yet. So, I pay my tab and decide to take a little walk. I'm looking for somewhere to wind down after this great dinner, and I remember hearing about a place called PullUpDC. It's not far, so I head over.When I walk in, it's got a completely different vibe--chill, laid-back, and the perfect place to just relax. I grab a blunt, kick back, and soak in the atmosphere. It's a great way to wind down after such a fun night at Proper 21. The perfect end to a great evening out in DC.
New to this area and decided to get a drink. Never felt so taken care of especially from the bartender Choi. She matched my vibe very well and made me feel like I could become a regular from now on!!
Great Service- Great Food. Literally, I have no complaints. There were a variety of food options to pick from

A gem in the city with an awesome happy hour on beers, wines and sangrias. I enjoyed my harvest apple sangria and beef rice bowl that the bartenders Choi and Manny recommended. They were attentive and friendly. There were several big screen tvs around the restaurant. Great ambiance and music

I recently visited Proper 21 for Date Night with me and my partner and had the pleasure of being served by Choi, Manny & Diana. Their service was outstanding from start to finish! Not only did they craft delicious drinks, but their attention to detail, knowledge of the menu, and friendly personality made the entire experience memorable. They went above and beyond to ensure that we were happy and enjoying their time. If you're looking for excellent drinks and top-notch service, I highly recommend visiting and asking for Choi, Manny & Diana. They truly made my night!
Outstanding food and atmosphere, but the service was another matter altogether. EVERY staff member was lightning fast and incredibly friendly. Make sure you ask for Thomas at the bar!

Good experience overall. Service was great, ambiance was nice. Food was innovative and good. We had a memorable experience! The staff was superb on caring about the allergies and earning our trust so we could have a fantastic evening.
Absolutely fantastic experience here! The food, drinks & service were all top notch and the atmosphere was lively but not too loud with a great vibe overall.

Good vibe! I love hanging out with friends there for happy hour. I have a dietary restriction and the staff always helps me figure out what I can eat or how to modify things so I won't get sick. Love the bartenders!!!

Came here on a Friday night and sat at the bar. It was very busy and the 2 wonderful bartenders made sure I was taking care of, didn't hesitate! The food was amazing! I had the proper burger and it was top tier! I also loved the atmosphere and ambiance, definitely a vibe! will definitely be back.!!! Choi and Manny are the best ! :)
Really good service , awesome food & loved the ambiance in this place. It's a really good place to stop by & have a drink at the bar.

I went there with my friends the other night and we all and a good time.I didn't know what to expect from there because I wasn't very familiar with the area but I sure did have a good time. The food and service was excellent and the staff was very polite too. The staff really made us feel like we're getting the VIP treatment. The atmosphere was so lively and the people there were great. If you're looking for a nice night out with someone friends or someone you know I'll definitely recommend this place.
Bartenders were amazing!!! Excellent service and very friendly! I will definitely be back!!! Choi, Manny and Wale!!! Go see them!!!

I dined at Proper 21 on Sunday and had the burger which was amazing. The service was just as great as my meal. My server was very attentive and gave great recommendations on beer and cocktails. I will definitely be back.

Well i came for a Saturday night to come get food couple drinks & man i'll say one of the best spots to chill vibe & just have some good food. Proper 21 service is always so busy which is understandable but the service still manage to check up on us take our orders & make us feel good, the drinks the food were amazing & came out a good time. Because it's a really good night vibe type of place to relax after a stress day or you know want to bring a date a perfect place.
If you want a fun and relaxing environment proper21 is the place great food and excellent service...

Every time I visit DC I always visit Proper 21, and recommend it to all of our friends, family and colleagues who are traveling and visiting the city.I recently stopped in for drinks and food after my long day in the office- the bartender was great! I had never tried the burgers but this time I did - thanks to the bartender's recommendation. Probably one of the best burgers I have ever had. The manager stopped by to ask me how everything was and I told him his staff was wonderful! He was super friendly. I can't wait to come back and experience this place again! - my husband is very jealous I went without him
Highly recommend this restaurant. The food, atmosphere, service, and management is top notch. A definite go-to when we visit the DC area.

Had reservations for 630 and showed up early and we were still seated promptly. Service was really good, and took care of a minor issue with the Brussel sprouts. Sandwhich was extremely good, maybe a tad overpriced, but still delicious. If you're in the area, recommend for lunch or an early dinner.
The best burger I have ever had in my life hands down. I. am rarely shocked and today I was shocked. Absolutely amazing. Bravo Proper 21
Very good ambience and great food

My girlfriend and I recently visited DC for the first time. We dropped into this location for a bite to eat. Place was packed but service was on point. The food and drinks arrived to our table in a timely manner. Fantastic experience!
I came to visit my daughter and was so thankful this place was open! Food was amazing! Will be returning on my next visit!
This place is fantastic!!! Amazing food amazing drinks! We were only in town for one night but so glad we stopped here. 100% would do again! Highly recommend
Literally have never tasted better, more flavorful chicken than the chimichurri half chicken.
Great burger and happy hour. Attentive service. Great atmosphere.I was visiting for work and I will make it a point to come back here again when I am back in the area.
I had a great time back in DC this bar had me feeling good thanks for everything I will definitely go there again !
I go to school in DC and this is one of my favorite places I've discovered so far! Kevin is the best waiter and the atmosphere and staff in general are engaged and nice.

Really enjoyed the vibe here. It's like a high end sports bar with a lounge feel. Nice selection of beers, which is where I dwell, but also had a nice selection of cocktails if your into that kind of thing. Place was pretty busy and the service was on point for being as busy as it was. Food was beyond good and on another level from most sport bars I've been to. Definitely recommend and will be back on my next travels to DC.
great atmosphere, great people, and delicious food. would recommend this bar to anyone.
Super delic! Highly recommend the crab dip

I came to Proper 21 on a Sunday and watched all of the games - So many Tvs! The bar scene was lively.Their bloody Mary's are perfect. It's everything you want for a good bar.Make sure you try one of the flatbreads they are heavenly! My favorite spot to come to when I'm in town!

Moved down to DC about a month ago from NYC and I must say, I couldn't be happier the Proper franchise chose to expand to DC with me. Their spots were my go to to watch sports and have a good time in NYC. I felt right at home tonight at Proper 21. Many more nights catching games there are ahead of me!
$15 per taco is ridiculous and for my taco to have had a hair in it, is disgusting. I do not recommend this place AT ALL

This place has really gone down hill. Sadly, a lot of the staff that I used to enjoy seeing is gone. Almost appears as tho the energy has been sucked out of the place. The food was not as amazing as I remember it being. Don't waste your time

Worst service. Worst food. Worst ambiance. I went in August and there were flies everywhere. Waitress didn't care for us at all. The food came out and the expo didn't even bother to clean the sides of the plates. Our waitress accidentally added a whole meal that we never ordered nor had served on our check, when I asked her to correct it, she gave us a very uninterested attitude. I don't know who would ever want to eat here, but I'm def not going back.
Love the nachos, tacos and margaritas here. Great food! But the service sucks. Takes forever.

Super authentic, great tasting, & super friendly. I certainly do not regret spending my coins here but they did end up being a little more expensive than I was expecting. Thank you to the server who got me and my son napkins after he spilled his water all over the floor.
The food and ambience is great! The staff is very nice!

I was so hungry so I decided to check out this local restaurant. They were located in dc near georgetown. When I got there the waster was very nice and respectable I really enjoyed the food will recomment again in the near future.

Of all the places in dc, I recommend this place the most for one reason--Andres. His talent for hospitality is undeniably one of the most captivating things about him, and thus Mexicue. He is kind, knowledgeable and a true treat to behold. I will be back to experience his one of a kind personality and service! All the time.
Very good food and drinks are very good also I give it a 8.5 out of 10. Nice place with friends to eat out.
Excellent service and food!!! Super friendly staff and speedy service.
The food was absolutely amazing, the staff was friendly and we had an overall really good experience.
Incredible food, friendly and welcoming staff, lively and fun atmosphere. Will definitely be coming back.
Batman (Ron) was amazing. We loved him. the food was amazing and so were the drinks. Service was 10/10
We literally come here for Miss Chris. she is the best!!! Go to the bar and ask for her, you will not regret it.
Dani, our server was wonderful!! The food was great!!
Best Mexican Food I have ever had. Try their salads. Or get more Guac than any other restaurant.

So the first time I was here my server was so bad but I decided to come back because of a friend who loves this place,my friend and I visited for happy hour on a Tuesday and when I say amazing! I had a mojito and my friend had a smokey margarita. They were only decent and we both ordered tacos as well. I had two chicken tacos and she had two pulled pork! The chicken was literally so juicy and tender, some of the best tacos I've had in DC. Our server Ayanna was amazing and very attentive. I had an amazing time! Can't wait to come back in the future!
Great foods, good vibes, & great service!! Bartender was awesome and pulled pork tacos are
A very pleasant night thanks to its service additional very rich food..
Had a great time here and the food is awesome!
Excellent!! Food, service, atmosphere, everything was excellent!
Very cool vibe and interesting menu! Margs were also great.
Appetizers and drinks were good , but food was bad , i'll be back just for the drinks

Steak, shredded pork, shrimp... all are too acidic, tones of lemon, lime... I understand that the use of lime is common in South American food but here it's over powered with the acidity...Tuna tartar, too seasoned and smashed/ purÃ©e texture.Service average, they don't explain the dishes, bring the glass of wine instead of pouring front of you for the wine by the glass Beautiful design, nice atmosphere

this place.... they honestly think they can charge the prices they do when the food they serve is disgusting. Its basically salt with a smidge of whatever food you ordered. In my case I got their rice and their 'tiger's blood ceviche'. Literally 'drank' the ceviche as there was no actual fish, it tasted like sea water. The 'fried rice' looked like they dug the rice out of the corner of the rice pot, threw it on a plate, and seasoned it with a handful of more salt! the bartenders were nice, food disgusting. Don't waste your time.
Ordered a chicken dish that had hardly any chicken in it. The waiter was nice, but never checked on us during our meal. We needed more water and I wanted another beer. Oh well
The food is not that good, it is a bit too creative for usual people's taste. I don't want to be unkind. They are trying but for me, I do not recommend.
Bien pero Me hicieron poner 5 estrellas de review y tener pisco sour gratis. Compran los votos. Servicio lento
The food was good. The drinks were great. The serve was good. The restaurant was clean and looked very nice.

Very authentic food. I would recommend skipping happy hour, which can get overcrowded. Sometimes service can be spotty. Dinner is so delicious you might forget it took you 15 minutes to get your drink. I recommend anything they serve with pisco in it, this is the place to go for that Peruvian staple. I would love to rate it higher but dining out is about the meal and about the service, and I can't rank the service any higher.

A GEM for ceviche and piscosIf you're a fan of ceviche and piscos, this spot is an absolute must-visit. The 'callejero' ceviche was flawless--just the right balance of spice, salt, and lime. Shout out to Andres for the recommendation.We decided on a whim to stop by on an early Thursday evening. Despite the bustling crowd, the staff, particularly Clarence, was incredibly accommodating, even without a reservation.The ambiance strikes a perfect balance between upscale and unpretentious, creating a welcoming atmosphere that embraced our casual attire.Our server, Andres, was attentive, knowledgeable, and extremely helpful throughout the meal.We sampled a variety of piscos--the traditional, passion fruit, and chicha--all delicious. While the chicha was a bit heavy on cinnamon for my taste, they graciously replaced it with another flavor upon request.In addition to the outstanding ceviche, we indulged in the volcano roll, chafa, lomo salteado, pollo salteado, and pescado macho. While the entrees were good, the ceviche undoubtedly stole the show. It's a definite must-have on any return visit.The entire wait and managerial staff remained attentive, frequently checking in, showcasing exceptional teamwork and communication.Glancing around, it was evident that this place attracts a diverse crowd--groups of young adults enjoying drinks and appetizers, older couples on romantic dates, business gatherings, and families.Their bar area also seemed to be a hit among patrons.Paid for parking in a tight garage accross the street.I will definitely be returning for more ceviche my next visit to DMV area.
Pleasantly surprised! The lomo saltado was a great and my favorite was the passion fruit pisco drink I got. Ceviche was good to share for just two people. Raul, our server, was great.
Definitely come here for the happy hour pisco sours for $8. Wish they had food on the happy hour menu!
Excellent service and great ceviche. Staff was very attentive. Also recommend the drinks.
Juan Rivera was a great server! I wasn't drinking at the time and he recommended me a great mock tail. I also didn't like my entree and he helped me exchange it for something better.
oscar r is a great server but need more gluten free labeling!!!!! love u oscar r
I love this restaurant. I have been here several times and drinks and foods are great. Thanks!
Recommended to me and Im glad it was. I had a delicious meal and dessert with friends and family. I even took home a doggy back.....and my dog for that matter! Just the way you want it to be.

We were so excited of try out this place last night , but we had a bad experience with our waiter , he was pretty rude and with actitud all the time . First of all we ordered a bottle of Malbec peruano , by the way great wine highly recommend .The place was packed and we were trying to make our order easy to the rude waiter, then we ordered four different things for appetizer and the entrees at the same time , but we told him that we wanted the food in the order that it have to be , seems like he don't understand it . Consequently appetizer and entrees came to the table at the same time . We had to send the entrees back to the kitchen . Right after this happen, the chef came out of the kitchen to apologize about of the misunderstanding. At the same time we let him know about how bad was the service from the waiter , and the chef don't doubt to send another waiter to take care of us , the new server name was "Raul" he was nice and polite. Finally we ordered double expresÃ³ coffee to enjoy our dessert
Nice place and good food. I would definitely recommend this place

My hotel was down the street from this spot. We had a long day after a conference and this was in walking distance. My coworkers and I went here together, and they were accommodating to the size of people. We ended up getting a few bottles of wine to share. The appetizers were more than enough to share as well. The entrees were spot on and delicious. We had a great time.
The food is great 4 starsThe services is 5 starsThe ambience is perfect Recommend to spend time and eat in this Peruvian restaurant
I'm a fan, service is awesome. Food is delicious.
Great place. Never a wait. A tad expensive but the best Peruvian near Logan Circle.

Great spot for large groups. They were very accommodating to our dietary needs and the food quality was truly remarkable!A menu top tip:Get the "lomo saltado" with a fried egg on top, you will thank me later! :)

Awesome atmosphere and food is to die for, so are the prices! Came here after hearing nothing but great things and people were not wrong about this place, the food and attention to detail is amazing.The servers here are extraordinary and they are constantly checking in, our server Yosef was hilarious and we enjoyed his conversation.Only short one star, the prices are definitely up there!
We had an amazing happy hour experience here. Astrid was a friendly and efficient server!
Love this place!! Food is amazing and super authentic. Great atmosphere and service rocks. Thanks Astrid!
Astrid was great!!!!!!!  and awesome and amazing. food was good need 85 characters
Great food, nice looking restaurant, and the staff were amazing. My dish was amazing!
We loved the ambience, top quality service! Marie took such a good care of us. We tried empanadas and the causa sampler! Cold beer and delicious sangria!
Delicious food and excellent service, Daniel Mauricio was very attentive and knowledgeable. Our group was very pleased. Definitely coming back!
Hello everyone, delicious food, good service, great ambiance, recommended, thank you!!

The dining experience at this restaurant is fantastic! From the moment you walk in the door, the wait staff is very welcoming and meticulous in taking care of every detail. Our server today was Jen. The ambience is elegant and cozy, with soft lighting and music that sets the mood just right. The quality of the food exceeded expectations, with fresh ingredients, exquisite presentation, and richness in each dish. The waiter's recommendations were also very professional, and she was able to give us very pertinent suggestions based on our tastes. Overall, the dining experience was very enjoyable, both in terms of taste and atmosphere.

A Culinary Journey to Peru: An Unforgettable Dining ExperienceStepping into this Peruvian restaurant feels like embarking on a vibrant and flavorful journey to the heart of Peru. From the moment we entered, the ambiance was warm and invitingThe Food: A True Feast for the SensesThe menu offers a masterful blend of traditional Peruvian dishes with modern twists, ensuring there's something for every palate. We started with the Ceviche Mixto, a stunningly fresh mix of seafood marinated in tangy lime juice, garnished with red onions, cilantro, and just the right amount of Peruvian aji for a subtle kick. The fish was incredibly fresh, practically melting in your mouth, and the citrus flavors were balanced perfectly, making every bite an explosion of freshness.For the main course, we couldn't resist the Lomo Saltado, a dish that epitomizes Peruvian fusion. The tender strips of beef, stir-fried with tomatoes, onions, and peppers, were cooked to perfection, and the accompanying crispy fries and rice provided a delightful contrast in texture. The rich flavors of the soy-based sauce added depth, and each bite felt like a perfect harmony of savory and umami notes.The Aji de Gallina was another standout, a creamy chicken stew with a hint of spice, served over potatoes and garnished with hard-boiled eggs and olives. The dish was comforting, flavorful, and rich without being overwhelming, showing the kitchen's expertise in balancing flavors.Finally, the dessert: a traditional Suspiro a la LimeÃ±a. This delightful treat of creamy dulce de leche topped with airy meringue was the perfect way to end our meal--sweet, indulgent, but not cloying.The Service: Impeccable and PersonalThe service was outstanding from start to finish. Our server was knowledgeable, attentive, and clearly passionate about the food, taking the time to explain the nuances of each dish and even offering recommendations based on our preferences. The staff was warm and friendly, making us feel like we were guests in their own home. Our water glasses were always full, and our needs were anticipated without being intrusive.The Experience: More Than Just a MealThe experience of dining here goes beyond just eating
Good food, great service, Eddy was wonderful! Had a wonderful time with my family, good ambiance.
Cesar was so accommodating to our big group. Fun birthday celebration for our 3 birthday! The food was great! Big portions
The food and drinks here are wonderful. We had the chaufa and ceviche- both wonderful!
Great service. We had a lot of fun, the food and service was great!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Thank you

I recently visited Pico y Nasco, an incredible Peruvian restaurant in DC, and I was absolutely blown away by the experience. The food is simply delicious, with a ceviche sampler and causas that are truly unparalleled. Their Peruvian dishes are equally fantastic, making it hard to choose a favorite.The service at Pico y Nasco is excellent. The staff is attentive and friendly, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The ambience inside is beautiful, adding to the overall dining experience. Even when it gets late, they don't make you feel rushed at all. In fact, they were kind enough to extend the kitchen hours to accommodate our orders, which was a wonderful gesture.I've celebrated my birthday and my cousin's bachelorette dinner at Pico y Nasco in the past, and most recently, I went with my boyfriend to celebrate his birthday, joined by my sister. Each visit has been memorable, and we are definitely planning to return soon. If you're looking for authentic and delicious Peruvian cuisine in DC, Pico y Nasco is the place to go!
A great Peruvian place. Ceviche is always the best choice. Fish is great. What's not to like.
Love w this location the best out Of the other ones You have to try the three tester drink option! So good
Amazing!!! Food, service, everything! This is our go to when we are in the area. Their happy hour prices are a steal too. Just make sure to always rsvp.

We arrived early on a Saturday morning. They hadn't opened yet, and we were about 5 minutes early. This gave us the chance to hear the manager talk to the staff about customer service and the menus. It was a great experience to hear that side of the business. Seemed very on point. Once we were seated and ordered, we elected to go with the prix fixe brunch menu. It was a great experience and our server was excellent at describing the menu options and talking us through the selections.Our server was Sarah, and she and the rest of the team were very attentive. We received new utensils for each course - which was a small thing, but really effective.For the appetizers - the empanadas were outstanding, as was the panko shrimp. For the main course, the chicken crepes were excellent - cheesy saucy goodness, with a bit of spice to round it out.The 3d course was the sweet menu - the blueberry waffles were SO good. They are worth a leading lady award. The mimosa / sangria option was decent. The sangria was pretty sweet, but the mimosas were really good.Overall it was a very good experience. The place filled up in no time and everyone seemed to really enjoy themselves.Highly recommend.

Very happy to come back here again this visit. They've a happy hour now, that for drinks. Food and service still good for me. Service is very nice and fast. I do recommend you should have reservations for your party because this restaurant is always busy.

I had an amazing time at pisco y nazca and will definitely be returning! I went with a group for a friends birthday and the staff was amazing! Our server Orlando was so great and even let us try some of their new drinks! I can't wait to come back again!

This restaurant offers an exceptional dining experience. The atmosphere is lively with a bustling bar, creating a vibrant energy throughout. The service is fantastic, with attentive staff who enhance the overall enjoyment of the meal. As for the food, it's simply the best. From the flavorful ceviche to the authentic Peruvian classics, every dish is a culinary delight. Don't miss out on their signature Pisco sours, a perfect complement to the delicious fare. This restaurant is a must-visit for anyone craving top-notch cuisine in a lively setting in Washington DC.

"Pisco y Nazca: A Culinary Journey Through Peru"My recent dining experience at Pisco y Nazca was nothing short of extraordinary. From the moment I walked through the door, I was transported to the vibrant streets of Peru, where flavors come alive and culinary traditions run deep.Pisco y Nazca is more than just a restaurant
Awesome atmosphere and attention to detail. Good drinks, great food, no judgement zone. Definitely worth it!
Great food and atmosphere! I love this place and their food!!! Recommend if it's close to you!
Went for lunch. Great atmosphere and the lunch menu had a great selection. The bar staff were very friendly.
Great service, something difeent... our service orlando was exceptional... we ate signature ceviche whitnsmoky flavor, 100% recommend pisco y nazca. Ambiance 10/10
Great food, ceviche and cocktails.  Great for business lunch. Always a good go to for out of towners.

This Peruvian gem exceeded expectations on every front! The Pisco sour was nothing short of amazing, and the Aji de gallina dish was a flavor explosion. The service was top-notch, attentive and friendly, adding to the overall positive experience. The interior was vibrant and fun, creating a lively atmosphere. Don't miss out on their happy hour deals - fantastic value for exceptional drinks.

I recently had the pleasure of dining at Pisco y Nazca Ceviche Gastrobar.From the moment we were seated, Jaime greeted us with a warm smile and made us feel right at home. He was incredibly knowledgeable about the menu, taking the time to explain the different types of ceviche and other traditional Peruvian dishes.Throughout the meal, Jaime's attentiveness was impeccable. He ensured that our glasses were always filled, checked in on us regularly, and made sure that we had everything we needed. His friendly and professional demeanor added to the overall enjoyment of our dining experience.His recommendations were spot-on, and each dish he suggested was a delight to the taste buds.The food at Pisco y Nazca Ceviche Gastrobar was outstanding. The ceviche was fresh and flavorful, and the other dishes we tried were equally impressive. Jaime's guidance in selecting the right dishes for our preferences made the experience even more enjoyable.Overall, Jaime's exceptional service at Pisco y Nazca Ceviche Gastrobar truly enhanced our dining experience. I highly recommend visiting this restaurant and requesting Jaime as your server.
The food was delicious, I had the arroz con pollo and the server Anna was excellent at the restauran!

I always enjoy dining at this restaurant and today was even better than most visits. Our server Ana was sweet, attentive, and always described our selections to us before we order to ensure we would be happy with our choices. The food was delicious and the atmosphere in the restaurant was comfortable and stylish! I highly recommend dining here!
I had a great time, have been 2 times before but not for brunch, we had an excellent time. Jaime was a great server
Oscar was amazing!! I got the aji de gallina and it was so delicious! Would definitely recommend
Oscar was the best!! 10/10 recommend the restaurant. Great food, atmosphere, and service.

On the weekend I came to enjoy the delicious food offered by pisco and nazca and had the service of Katy, an excellent person was very attentive to our table and everything was very well celebrated my birthday and brought to the table a delicious dessert with a candle thank you pisco and nazca for such a good experience.
great food and great service very recommended
excellent Freon and excellent service from Sara.
The food was very good our server Eduardo was on on point with everything will be coming back for sure.
Amazing! Such an amazing restaurant. The drinks are delicious and the food is even better. The ceviche is
Service is great! Drinks are amazing as well. Atmosphere is great for a work happy hour.
everything is amazing, I enjoy always the bar area.

Tonight was our first time trying Pisco y Nazca and it was 10/10. We didn't have a reservation and they were able to work with us to make sure we were still able to get a table. Our server, Raul, was fantastic and all his recommendations were phenomenal. Can't recommend this place enough!!

Visiting DC and decided to try this place for dinner! Came for lomo saltado, but was really wowed by everything else we ordered. The pescado a lo macho was AMAZING. If you like octopus, the plancha pulpo is great.

Service was amazing because of Raul's hospitality. He suggested me the right dishes/drinks. I got the traditional pisco and it was honestly one of the smoothest drinks I've ever had. It was my first time trying Peruvian food, so Raul allowed me to have such a great introduction. Lomo saltado is the popular entree and rightfully so. The steak, sauce and fries paired with the perfectly cooked jasmine rice was just amazing and harmonious. I would definitely go again.

My husband and I were looking for a special place to celebrate the 6 years we've been together and we chose Pisco y Nazca and they didn't disappoint! The food is delicious (can't go wrong with ceviche & a classic Pisco Sour!) Our server Raul was very friendly and helpful with his recommendations. Great atmosphere and fun music. Would definitely come back!
Great atmosphere, food, and hospitality! Raul's service was amazing and very accommodating -- great food & drink recommendations to suit our tastes! The Pisco Punch is a must have!

Amazing food and amazing service!! Today, we share the Ceviche plater (a suggestion from waiter) and we love it! Sea food is always good. Great atmosphere, good location. Definitely one of the best Peruvian places in DC. Sorry for the lack of pictures but we were too excited about the food
Best pisco sour! Loving getting drinks and food here any day of the week. Orlando was our waiter this time and he's great!
Shoutout to Katy for making our dinner amazing! She made the night for our party. Highly recommend!
I really enjoyed both the drinks and food here. The happy hour deal is very good, and the drinks are amazing. Katy was our waitress and she was very attentive and nice. 10/10
Such great food and drinks! The sangria blanco is the best, and the staff is so friendly, def recommend!!
Katy was a such a friendly server! food and drinks were also lovely
Fabulous food and our server Christian was amazing!

The restaurant's lovely decor sets the stage for a romantic night out. Although I only had a drink, the passion pisco sour was delightful, with a perfect balance of sweetness, tartness, and fizziness from the passionfruit and egg white. The portion size of the lomo soltado was generous, perfect for sharing. The attentive waiter added to the overall experience.
Absolutely amazing ceviches with a great bar and even better service from Ernesto! Relaxed and modern ambiance with traditional Peruvian fare.... Well done and welcome.
the food and atmosphere was amazing!!!! Sam was our server and he was very attentive to us!!! 5 stars all around!!!!!!

I had an absolutely delightful dining experience at this restaurant, and I simply must express my heartfelt gratitude to our outstanding waiter, Jaime. From the moment we walked in, Jaime's warm smile and welcoming demeanor set the tone for a wonderful evening. Their attentive service was impeccable, ensuring that every aspect of our meal was nothing short of perfection. Jaime's extensive knowledge of the menu and thoughtful recommendations enriched our culinary adventure, making sure we tried dishes we wouldn't have discovered otherwise. Their genuine passion for their work was evident, and it truly elevated our dining experience. Not only was Jaime professional and efficient, but they also made us feel like valued guests, creating a sense of genuine connection that is rare to find in the restaurant industry. Thank you, Jaime, for going above and beyond to make our evening truly special. We look forward to returning soon to relish the fantastic food and your wonderful hospitality once again!

My experience at Pisco y Nazca Ceviche Gastrobar was absolutely exceptional, and the Poche Ã  la cobre meal was a true highlight that deserves special recognition!The restaurant's vibrant and inviting ambiance immediately sets the stage for a delightful dining experience. From the moment I walked in, I was impressed by the warm and welcoming atmosphere, making me feel right at home.The Poche Ã  la cobre meal was an absolute delight! The dish was a perfect fusion of flavors and textures, showcasing the best of Peruvian cuisine. The tender and succulent steak, paired with the flavorful plantains, rice, poached eggs and vegetables, created a heavenly combination that left me speechless. Each bite was a celebration of taste, and the presentation was as beautiful as the flavors.The cocktail selection was equally impressive, with Pisco-based cocktails that were expertly crafted and complemented the meal perfectly.The service at Pisco y Nazca was top-notch, with the staff being attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable about the menu. They were eager to provide recommendations and ensure that every guest had an unforgettable dining experience.In conclusion, Pisco y Nazca Ceviche Gastrobar is a culinary gem that should not be missed. The Poche Ã  la cobre meal and the exceptional ceviche offerings, combined with the vibrant ambiance and stellar service, create a dining experience that is second to none. If you're looking for a taste of Peru and an outstanding dining adventure, Pisco y Nazca is the place to go!

I recently had the pleasure of stopping by and was blown away by the fantastic flavors and quality of the food.The vibe of the restaurant is also top-notch, making it an ideal spot for brunch or happy hour. Whether you're looking for a relaxed atmosphere to catch up with friends or a lively scene to kick off your night, this place has you covered.While everything I tried was fantastic, I have to give a special shout-out to the ceviche - it was simply outstanding. I recently dined at Pisco Y Nazca and was blown away by the incredible food and service! I started off with their famous pisco sours, which were perfectly balanced and full of flavor. For appetizers, I ordered the anticuchos de corazÃ³n and ceviche, both of which were delicious. The anticuchos had a great char and the ceviche was perfectly tangy.For my entree, I ordered the causa sampler, ajÃ­ de gallina, tallarines verde, and tacu tacu with honey pork. The causa sampler was a great way to try a variety of flavors, and the ajÃ­ de gallina was one of the best I've ever had. The tallarines verde was a great vegetarian option and the tacu tacu with honey pork was hearty and delicious.The real star of the night was our server, Carlyle. He was incredibly knowledgeable about the menu and made great recommendations. He also went above and beyond to ensure we had a great dining experience. I can't recommend this restaurant enough - the food and service were both top-notch! Five stars!

I recently dined at Pisco Y Nazca and it was an unforgettable experience. From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was warm and inviting. The staff was friendly and Carlyle, my server, went above and beyond to make sure my dining experience was enjoyable. He provided excellent recommendations and made sure I was well taken care of throughout my meal.The menu was extensive and offered a wide variety of traditional Peruvian dishes. I started off with the pisco sours, which were expertly crafted and had the perfect balance of sweetness and sourness. The anticuchos de corazÃ³n, or skewered beef heart, were incredibly flavorful and tender. The ceviche was also a highlight and had a great balance of acidity and heat.Next, I tried the causa sampler which included three different variations of the traditional Peruvian dish and was a great way to try different flavors. The ajÃ­ de gallina, a creamy chicken and yellow pepper stew, was rich and comforting. The tallarines verde, a green noodle dish, was also delicious and had a great balance of flavors.The tacu tacu with honey pork was my favorite dish of the evening and I couldn't get enough of the crispy and flavorful rice and bean cakes paired with the sweetness of the pork.Overall, Pisco Y Nazca exceeded my expectations and I will definitely be back for more. The food was delicious and authentic, the service was top-notch, and Carlyle made the experience even more enjoyable. I highly recommend giving Pisco Y Nazca a try! 5 STARS!
I absolutely love this place. The food is amazing and my server/bartender Oscar R. Gave the best service I have ever had. So friendly, attentive and funny.

We tried out the tasting menu and let me tell you it didn't disappoint at all. To start we had a ceviche platter and boy did it not disappoint. Everything was so unique in its on way and had such distinctive tastes. We then got another platter of different salads - chicken, shrimp and tuna - all served on mashed sweet potatoes. This tasted amazing as well and at this point we haven't even got to the mains yet! For mains we got the Lomo Saltado and the Pescado a lo Macho. Each was cooked to perfect and the portion size was massive. I wasn't able to finish it and had to take it home. All this whole we were sipping on a Pisco Sour flight - the original, passion sour, and chica sour. They worked so well with our food and was so glad that it was part of the tasting menu! At the end, we ended with some Pionono a la Monde - rolled sponge cake, dulce de leche, Nutella and gelato. A wonderful way to end a wonderful night of amazing food.

Pisco Y Nazca is a lively Peruvian restaurant near DuPont Circle. The place is very lively on a Saturday night and I truly had an amazing time with my friends out. I got the Pinazo, Ceviche Sampler, Plancha Pulpo, and Buenazo.Pinazo: the bartender has a pretty heavy hand when it comes to cocktails, and my friends all thought that their drinks were a bit overpowered by the alcohol of their choice. I agree, but i appreciate the value. Ceviche Sampler: their ceviche is perfect - not too citrusy, not too sour. The perfect way to see what they offer! I enjoyed the middle option. Plancha Pulpo: a classic and a must have. Buenazo: amazing brownie + ice cream dessert. Overall: an amazing spot to go out with your friends or family!!
Amazing food and even better service! Shout out to Raul, our server, who patiently walked us through the menu and made bomb recommendations. The pisco is not to be missed!
Amazing service and will come back again. Our server Sara explained the menu to us being our first time and gave us amazing recommendations. Because of Sara, we will continue coming to Pisco Y Nazca.

All of the servers are so friendly and wonderful. This restaurant was the highlight of my birthday night. The food is so yum and the drinks are fully worth every dollar. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a fun dinner location.
I loved my dinner at Pisco y Nazca Ceviche Gastrobar! the salmon was delicious & our waitress Sarah was amazing! Incredibly helpful, sweet, & knowledgeable about the Restaurant menu!
BEST PERUVIAN FOOD IN DC! Good vibes, good drinks, and great ppl! Alex and Vladimir are awesome, come thru for a good timeeeeeee
BEST PLACE IN DC BY FAR. Been 4+ times. Vladimir B. and Alex are the BEST servers, genuinely love no one more than them. Always have an amazing time with them!!!!!!!!-

What an experience! There's clearly a lot of thought put not only into the food, but the service and ambiance as well. The menu was somewhat intimidating, but our server Cesar was well-read and extremely helpful. As my fiancÃ©e and I aren't big seafood people, we went with the pollo causa, carne anticucho, and carne empanada. The causa is one of the coolest things I've ever tried. It reminded me of a potato salad, but with so much more flavor. For dessert, we got the bunazo, basically a brownie with more chocolate on top and ice cream on the side. The drink menu is well thought out too, with Peruvian-inspired drinks and beer. Their happy hour also runs generously late!
Oscar has been the most amazing server we've had in DC, he's recommendations and knowledgeable of the menu and drinks made our experience unforgettable, will definitely recommend and come back soon!
Loved this place - the menu was perfect for sharing and we loved everything we ordered. My favorite was the seafood saltado
Great services took my girlfriend here for her birthday and she's Peruvian she loved it
The best of the best when it comes to Peruvian food yummy gracias Chico's Jose ...... from Lorenzo & Alejandra (Alex)
The food was amazing and the server was attentive. I especially liked their shooters.
Wonderful service and delicious food. The tostones were AMAZING and the ceviche was perfect for the spring weather. Will definitely be back!

this is one of the best restaurants i've ever been to! everyone here makes me feel like family and the food is actually too good.make sure to try the tasting menu! I'm super full and the drinks were the perfect size!

Truly a Peruvian restaurant. The food was fantastic and really showed the flavors of authentic Peruvian food. Excellent service from Jose and Oscar. Always treated with great energy, patience and respect. Chef makes a meal that will leave anyone satisfied and happy.Verdaderamente un restaurante Peruano. La comida fue fantÃ¡stica y demostrÃ³ los sabores de la comida Peruana. Servicio excelente de JosÃ© y Oscar. Siempre nos trataron con energÃ­a, paciencia y respeto. El chef cocina comida que dejarÃ¡ satisfechos y feliz a todos.

Impressive assortment expertly served by Gerardo. Our children were able to chose from child-friendly options and it was all of incredible quality in the ingredients, confection and plating. The octopus was cooked just right and the ceviche and pisco sours were to die-for.A 100% repeat for our next visit to DC!
Oscar and Jose are mvps, made our dinner fantastic with humor and service!
Great food great atmosphere great pisco y nazca alex u are the best !!!!!
