I really enjoyed the ambiance and vibes of this restaurant. Definitely a good spot for all meals! I wouldn't say the food is to die for but everything I have had has been really good. Plus the staff is really kind.

The atmosphere lived up to the reviews in Busboys & Poets, when I walked in I felt as if I was right at home. I could feel the passion and love for books everywhere I looked. The art and paintings on the wall were truly miraculous. The hostess told us our wait time would be 15 minutes, unfortunately it turned out to be 35 minutes. After we were seated we waited 10 minutes until someone asked us for our drink orders. The menus was very easy to read and QR menus were available. The food took 25 minutes to come out which was okay given the amount of people in the establishment. When I saw my Chicken Carnitas Quesadilla it looked absolutely mouth watering! The meal's looks were not deceiving, I enjoyed every bite! After my entree I enjoyed their chocolate cake, it was very rich and the blueberries were a interesting touch. Although, I did not attend a poem reading, Busboys & Poets, is a wonderful place to dine and the food is superb.
Good food and good service.Relax and a lot of options on the menuThe Cubano panini was very good
It is the best for Celiac people, variety of gluten free options!! Love their wings (souces on the side), falafel, wild rice, French toast and eggs for branch!!
This place was great for brunch. The bartender D was great. Thanks for a pleasant visit today.
The wait for a table was so long, but it was Saturday night. The food on a scale of 1-5 was a 4.0. Service 4.1.

We went here for brunch. I got the Reuben, two of my friends got the scrambled eggs with meat, and one got the chicken salad sandwich. The food was decent, nothing too special. But I am giving the place four stars for atmosphere. It's a cool idea how it is attached to the book store. I would love to go to one of their poetry nights. If people are visiting from out of town this could be a cool location to go. Also, very good with large groups especially when it comes to splitting the check.

We actually ate at 2 different locations in 24 hours---dinner and then brunch the next day. Neither place disappointed. The chicken salad sandwich with the sweet potato fries was great and the sweet potato pancakes were delicious. The others enjoyed their meals too.

We got there right before it got super crowded at 945 on a Sunday. The food was pretty good and plentiful. We love the atmosphere! Im such a breakfast person so I might be a little hard to please and with that said, I'd go back for the atmosphere and give lunch a try.
Good Brunch Place with bookstore right next to you. Pair anything with a bookstore and it's a good idea.

A really interesting project is going on here! The bookstore inside the restaurant creates a unique atmosphere I really liked. I tried the Iraqi corned beef hash and it was really good! There are many vegetarian options but I haven't tried any yet.The service was ok, not fast nor slow but they were really friendly.

Great place for late night eats, drinks and conversing. The bookstore is stocked with interesting books and magazines from progressive writers, making for insightful reading and discussion while waiting for a table. I went there with a friend when it first opened, so it had room for improvements. The menu was extensive and the food was yummy. I love their choices of coffee, teas and drinks which you can get at either the restaurant table or the bar. They usually have events there weekly so there's always something going there. I recommend checking it out
I will always love this place, has the best food... great atmosphere!

Great small traditional eating place! Busboys and Poets is a household name, at least amongst my personal friend circle.They are far more unique places in DC To eat, but if you are looking for classic easy-to-make, Traditional food then this is your spot!I always get the Fried Chicken (herb cornmeal-encrusted chicken breast with a chardonnay cream sauce
Nice ambiance, good vibes. Great place to buckle down & get some work done :)
Great food, great atmosphere. Gotta try the brunch!
Like this place a lot. I like the mornings when they serve breakfast. They also have an amazing fresh orange juice to go with breakfast. Its quite in the mornigs and they have wifi.
This is a very late review, but from what I can remember, I LOVED the atmosphere and food (of course). We had to wait a while, but their little bookstore is adorable and took up much of our time.
My mom requests that we eat here every time she visits. I am obsessed with the sweet potato pancakes. The service is always great.
good food great atmosphere!
Love the atmosphere at Busboys and Poets in College Park. Food is awesome
Good food, but it is ALWAYS busy when I go there. I think they need to staff just a little bit better.

Great, family friendly option with a wide-ranging menu that includes vegan/vegetarian/gluten free meals to meet a variety of dietary restrictions. The menu is so big that nothing I've eaten here has been mind-blowingly amazing - high quantity mediocre quality, but meals are consistently tasty. This is a regular stop whenever I host family from out of town, as it meets the needs of all diners, whether they're adventurous or super picky. The store also boasts a great book selection - I love the children's books that celebrate racial diversity as well as options that promote female protagonists.
Loved the atmosphere. Food was pretty good. I would definitely visit next time in the D.C. area.
I wish there were more places like this!
Great place and amazing atmosphere! I wish there was one in CA.

Actually, I had a business meeting there 4 days ago, the atmosphere was a little bit nice, I ordered house salad with Blacken salmon and I liked it for sure, I just want to share my experience which is I recommended this place for small business's meeting.
Friendly staff, good food and great drinks.

Came here for one of their open mic nights and it was amazing to see people of all levels perform their work of art. Performances ranged from instruments, to spoken word, to singing, etc. The crowd showed love for everyone that performed. Nothing but good vibes in this place. Note: Admission is $5 and they have limited seating so arrive early!Would return for another open mic night and to try their food!
Very vegan friendly!

OMG!!! This restaurant is the BOMB.COM!!! Drinks amazing! Food... DUMB STUPID!!! I ordered the Salmon with corn and kale greens... It was to die for! The food was so damn good I went the next day and they told me that they was not serving the same dish until 5:00pm. Thats when I was pissed! But the decor is crazy! I wish they had places like this in Miami. The closes I get to something like this is Starbucks! Money well spent. OH and they have this drink called the DC TAP WATER... DUMB STUPID!!! I recommend this restaurant to anyone who is visiting the Metropolitan area!!!

This place has great food and a great atmosphere. I really enjoy this place especially I like to come in early afternoon and have a cup of coffee and do my work. I also like to wake up early on Sunday and have a cup of coffee I like this atmosphere and I really like the fact that there is always a suprise weather it is a poetry readying or music.
Ate breakfast here and was very impress. I love the atmosphere and the vibe.
Definitely wanna go again to have another awesome choice for the lunch or brunch: )
I would highly recommend it. Delicious food, amazing atmosphere, wonderful staff. What more could someone ask for?
could spend all day and night eating and drinking in this place!

Fantastic vibe. I really like this place. The food was excellent and everyone who works here couldn't have been nicer. I'm not a poet and honestly I'm not much of an artsy super reader, but you really don't have to be here. All types of folks who enjoy a relaxing warm atmosphere with good food are here. I might just have to hold back a star because it can be a little crowded. A lot of folks with their laptop and a coffee park it for quite a while at regular seating tables. Maybe if there was a separate, non-eating area for such things. There may have been one? Didn't see it though. However, an excellent set-up. I will absolutely make it a regular.
Great vegan nachos.
Good food and service. Excellent grits and cappuccino.

Great vibe and good food! The fact that we had to wait for a table didn't even bother us, as we had the great bookstore to keep us occupied. Got an awesome book, enjoyed the company and the energy of the restaurant, the cool art on the walls and the food. First time going there and would absolutely go again!
I had brunch here and thought it was very good
great food and different atmosphere than what I am used too. Loved it!!
Service was nice enough. The food was amazing
Great coffee. Good vegan brunch options. A fantastic little book store to browse while you're waiting for a table (at least at the u street location). Highly recommend it.
I like the book store. Lots of vegan options. A little expensive.
though the food is just ok, it just feels so good to be in this place. feels like home.
I love their brunch.......
The vibe was awesome!

Love this place. Visited DC for the March for Jobs and Justice rally, and had been referred to this place to grab a bite to eat. The food is delicious and you get great portions for your buck. Being the creative artsy person that I am, this place was right up my ally. Its very bohemian, hipster, skinny jeans and geek glasses if you know what I mean. They have different events throughout the week such as slam poetry, book readings, etc. They have a few locations in dc as well as one in hyatsville md which is one that I venture to the most. But nonetheless, its a great spot to hang out at with friends and just have a great time
Love this place! One of my faves.

I came here for Brunch and I have to say I was impressed. I'd only been to the one in Hyattsville so i figured that while I was in the area I might as well go to the original. My waiter was attentive and had a few suggestions that turned out really well. I'm officially a fan of the franchise.
Go for the desserts.
Love! Artsy, spunky, healthy, and authentic!
Great service and good food.

I am in love with this place, very nice place to hang out with my girlfriend. Trade Market store, unique rare items to purchase and so on. Food is also good there. One other thing that I like their homemade meatloaf with sauteed spinach ,mushroom on top of mushed potato. What a homy dish.
The catfish was great,the service was good and it wasn't crowded.
The food is good and the ambiance is fun.
had a lovely brunch here while i was in DC.
One word: grits. Heck yes!
nice decor and great brunch. a good place to hang out by yourself or with a small group of people. if waiters were more attentive i'd give it 5 stars.
Great brunch! Awesome atmosphere!

I enjoy coming to bus boys, they have a cool realxed atmosphere. I love thier crab cakes platter, and their bread pudding dessert is to die for!@ It's a must I eat one of those every time I go there..and I also love all their different flavor mojitos!!
Good stuff.

Jack is incredible! I had a sort of unusual experience (involving an undocked CaBi bike I had to leave behind to catch the bus) and he went above and beyond to help me. Truly so kind and helpful, I can't recommend this store or Jack specifically enough!
Very good service friendly atmosphere and attentive to my needs. The food was excellent

My daughter suggested we have brunch at Bus Boys and Poets and it was my first time. We had the best waiter, John, he was attentive to allour needs! The food was amazing! I had chicken and pancakes and my daughter had shrimp and grits! The atmosphere was electric! I give it a 10 out of 10!

Busboys and Poets is such a cool spot! The vibe is artsy and welcoming, the food is delicious, and it's the perfect place to relax or catch up with friends.Follow my IG account for Curated Google Maps list for brunch, happy hours, rooftops, parks, wineries & more in the DMV area: @yourdmvbestie

This was our first time at Busboys and we had an awesome time!! Jordan was fantastic and took really great care of us. We had multiple allergies in our group and everyone was able to get excellent food. 5 stars!

Showed up with a friend to get a late lunch/early dinner happy hour meal and things were fantastic! Kendall was an absolute angel and the service was incredible. We started with a shared plate of nachos which were delicious and I had a tempeh panini with a side of caesar salad. Love stopping by Busboys, the vibe is always so chill and relaxing.

I had the pleasure of being served by Journey at Busboys and Poets, and he made my dining experience truly unforgettable. From the moment we were seated, Journey greeted us with a warm smile and an inviting energy that set the tone for the entire meal. He was attentive without being intrusive, anticipated our needs, and provided thoughtful recommendations from the menu that we absolutely loved.Journey's knowledge of the menu, quick service, and genuine care for his guests stood out. He took the time to ensure everything was perfect and went above and beyond to make sure we felt valued. It's rare to encounter someone so committed to providing not just great service but a memorable experience.If you're lucky enough to be seated in Journey's section, you're in for an amazing dining experience. Thank you, Journey, for your kindness, professionalism, and excellent service--I'll definitely be back!
Journey was super nice and attentive and met all of our needs even when we wanted to order substitutions not on the menu. Please come and ask for him.

jaleel was an excellent server! he was charming and attentive to my table. his wit combined with his accommodating spirit made us feel very cared for throughout the whole night. he is very good at his job. he recommended excellent dishes we had not tried and really amplifed our dining experience. 5 stars across the board!
this person is really nice and the service was amazing 9/10 or even 10/10 would really come back next time she has a bright future ahead of her also the waiters name was Andrea
Kiyah was amazing! Great recommendation on the Brussels sprouts, friendly and great service!
Ki was really great! The service was excellent and she was really nice. She explained everything really well
Ki was such an amazing server and treated us so well -- could not recommend more ! Plus the food is so so solid
Kai was great! Food, atmosphere, and service was top notch. service was also great! On street parking wasn't too bad
Ki gave great service, very personable and professional. Attentive without being obtrusive, Ki made this a great experience!
Ki!! she was amazing! she made this experience one of a kind. it was my first time eating with you guys she made it seem less and went above and beyond.
Busboys is my go to for meetings in the area. Kiyah was the best and the lavender ube latte was delicious!
I was able to work, eat and chill at my own pace with great servers. Thank you Kiyah and Kendall to for making me feel so welcome and ok with being somewhere new.
Fantastic food and service. Kendall was so lovely and helpful and the food was prompt and delicious. the vibes are super great, definitely embodies "peace and love"! Looking forward to returning!
Kiyah was excellent And very professional 10/10 recommend. She always checked in and was very pleasant
busboys and poets is awesome!! great food and atmosphere our server kiyah was fantastic!!
Kiyah was great! Always love coming here, whether it's the D.C location or the one in Columbia. Food and service are awesome!
Food good/ hot/tastyAmbiance nice/quaint/ cleanService - Jordan w/an A was amazing super kind and attentive

Jordan is a shining DELIGHT!! We love busboys and Jordan made our brunch experience (somehow) even better! Great recs, cute jokes, and had our drinks and dessert brought out to us at perfect times! We'll already return next time we're in DC, but would honestly return just for Jordan.
Server was freaking awesome we LOVE Jordan! Also food was fantastic. Will for sure be coming back next time we're in town
Jordan was great server. Good comfort food and ambiance. Enjoyed my experience
Jordan was awesome!! super fun & nice, you'll be well taken care of with her as your server!!! steak asparagus salad was soooooo gooooood.
One of my favorite places in DC. The food was great and our server, Jordan, made our experience extra special.
The food was so good. The service was great! Jordan was an amazing server and made the experience so fun.
Kendall was a fantastic and attentive server! She also has great glasses :)Food was good, the sweet potato hash was a little smaller than I would have liked.
Food and service is always top-notch!! Jordan is a wonder team member that makes the ambiance incredible. So warm and cozy - a feeling most breakfast and coffee shops can't capture in today's times.
Server had great service, and was very friendly. The food was good, and the ambiance of the restaurant was warm.
Jordan was great and very attentive. I appreciate the service.I was there for breakfast and was happy to learn that they had gluten free options!Thank you

We were served by Kiyah and she was just the most considerate, nicest and funny waitress ever! We always felt well taken care of and could always ask her for suggestions. 5 out of 5 in service for sure! The food was delicious and big portions, ambience really nice with a book store next by - lovely!

Kiyah was an absolute delight as a server and very friendly and attentive. The food was great too, the restaurant is quite big but yet cozy and I loved the vibe of it having a bookstore inside as well. â€‹â€‹â€‹
Kiyah is a gem! So polite and accurate in putting in our large group's orders. The food was also stellar and I can't wait to come back.
Kiyah provided great service! Great atmosphere and the food never disappoint. I highly recommend this location.

I haven't been to this location in a long time but I will say the service, food and ambiance remain outstanding. Always great vibes! If you dine here, please look for Erick to provide you with great meal recommendations, very informative and attentive beyond words. You're a rockstar, Erick!!! Thank you!
Eric is fantastic server and the food is outstanding!! All around great experience.I enthusiastically recommend Bus Boys and Poets!

Andrea was great, the service was fantastic and the food was tasty and well-priced. We had the eggs and the vegan egg wrap, the portions were huge and a Andrea was happy to box up anything that we didn't eat.
Great food and atmosphere and an exceptionally good server who was full of life,very helpful and made our evening very pleasant.  Her name was Jordan as I recall.
Delicious dinner and excellent service from Jordan. She made our night! incred cheerful and helpful. Thank you Jordan!
Kiyah was great, VERY SWEET! She suggested the best of everything & we were very satisfied!

We are on restaurants food tour in the DMV, and out of 7 restaurants we visit today Erick is by far the best servers we have ever experienced. please recognize him for his great job, and keep on board he is awesome
Wonderful service from Kaiya, amazing crab cake sandwich too. Visiting in town briefly and this is a perfect spot.
Kiah was so attentive and accommodating! Food was delicious and the atmosphere is great.
Eric was great! Very engaging and nice. He brought the food out fast and offered great advice for what to get.
Ericks service was immaculate! very respectful, friendly, and demure. 12/10 service!!!
kiyah was an excellent server ! 1000/10. Food was fast hot and good ! I will be back ! Thankyou

"I had an incredible dining experience here thanks to our server, Jordan C. She knows the menu and suggested the perfect combo - their house burger paired with tomato soup. The burger was delicious, cooked exactly right, and the tomato soup was the ideal complement. Sometimes, servers make recommendations to make recommendations, but Jordan's suggestion was spot-on and made our meal special. She provided attentive service throughout without being overbearing. I will definitely be back and hope to get seated in Jordan's section again!
Jordan was AMAZING and an awesome serves for our large party. Also half off burger Mondays are the best!
Kendall did great, seating is very comfortable I enjoyed. Wings are great and some of the best fries in the city.
Jordan rules! Super nice and recommended a great cocktail! I hope she wait on me next time...
location: South Four Corners, Silver Spring, MD

text: Jordan, our server, was the best! Recommended ta great salad and fantastic cozy cocktail.
Jordan was the bomb! Was really bubbly and attentive. Always a foot away, kind and really made the experience so much better. Food was quick and good quality, and as always the atmosphere is great.
Jordan was amazing! She was so bubbly, attentive, and sweet. Would love to be sat with her again :)
Kendall was amazing!!! So kind and attentive. She made sure our big party was happy and well fed. Always with a smile

We went on Burger Monday! The food was so delicious, and the chipotle mayo is a must have every time. Our server, Jordan, was so amazing, and made our experience so smooth and fun. The song choices are very nice, they are decorated nicely for the holidays. A great time!
our server jordan was really nice and attentive! the food came out really fast and it was delicious my plate was clear. i love the vibes of the restaurant
Jordan was the nicest server I've had since coming to D.C! The food came quickly and was very good.
Kyndall was fantastic. We have come here many times but the service today was top notch! She is friendly attentive and very accommodating. I'll be requesting her the next time we visit!
Kendall is the best server! And I love the renovation, thanks for your longstanding commitment to our neighborhood Busboys
Kendall was great! Food, ambience, and service were excellent.Thank you! Can't wait to come back
Excellent hot chocolate and nice atmosphere - thanks for the great service from our server, Jordan!
Best service in a long time. From Jordan she was kind pleasant and on time with think.
Jordan was very considerate and nice will eat there again very cool!!!!I recommend this spot drinks are the bomb very good u cant taste the alcohol food was amazing
Had an amazing time as always :) Kyndel was lovely and took amazing care of us! And the food was great too
had a great meal and enjoyed my server's service (Kendall) and food/drink recommendations!
Jordan was a great sever. she had great customer Service great communication also Check on my table more than 3 times lol also made my nephew feel at home
The vegan burger was really good and Jordan's service was awesome! Will definitely return!
Food was very yummy and my server, Jordan, was so sweet and attentive. I was able to get a lot of work done and the space is laptop and wfh friendly
Jordan! Was amazing!!! Definitely a gem! Looking forward to the next visit! Efficient & Hospitality was great!Ambiance was great! Great job Jordan!!!
Visited busboys today. Great ambiance. I was able to lounge a bit work, and had great food and drinks. Also, great service from Andrea! Will definitely be back to this location soon!
my server was Andrea and even though I just ordered a cup of coffee, she was so attentive! very good vibes to do work here during the day.
andrea was my server and she was very attentive and nice! also the food was really good
We had an excellent meal with excellent service - Jordan was amazing and fun and took great care of us!
Anjalie was a great server, super kind and attentive. We had an amazing time.
Anjali is awesome! the food was great :) thankful for this space (I also got a book!)
Great food, ambiance, and service. My server Cora was amazing l! I came fir brunch and really loved it...laid back atmosphere, fast, service, and the food quality was exceptional.
Super friendly service, great food and it came out fast!!!!Family has been coming here for years luv the bookstore concept :)

Friendly, attentive server. My order was accurate and I didn't wait long for my meal, eight minutes. I'm glad that I came out for today's brunch. It was going to be either the western omlette or their delicious Frech toast.
Food and drink were outstanding as usual, service was pleasant and efficient - a highly recommended DC standby as always! Cora and the team are doing justice to one of my longtime favorites :-)
The food and customer service was AMAZING. Alex was the best and I can't to come back again.
Love this place. Jordan is one of the most pleasant table captains i have ever met. Look forward to returning

After returning 2 years later, I would just like to amplify the exceptional service I received from Eric and Jordan. Both were AMAZING!!! I ordered the Buttermilk Pancakes, Vegan Sausage and Spiced Chai Latte w/ pumpkin syrup added. Everything was gooooooodddd, fresh and made to order! I believe since my last visit they did a renovation which now provides a brighter and more spacious environment. I'm looking forward to my next visit.

Kendall was amazing! Great recommendations and great service . I had the lamb burger which i would rate a 8/10 i think it would really shine with pickled onions. My cousin had the French toast with crispy bacon and none of it was left on her plate. Definitely would come again during happy hour!!
Kyndal was great, very kind, and helpful! She gave me a great recommendation and I'm so glad I listened to her
Great service! Eric was friendly and wonderful and breakfast was delish. Wonderful morning
Great Service by Kendall at brunch today. Lovely ambience and interesting art on the walls. Decent food

Kendall is an amazing server because she was very attentive to us, she was beyond polite, and very knowledgable about the menu to help you make great selections. Her Southern charm made us feel welcome and brighten the mood.
Andrea was amazing and made our visit so welcoming. We ordered wings and drinks, which were all good

Bus Boys and Poets on 14 Street is one of my favorite restaurants. The food, service, and ambiance are all exceptional. Today's dinner was no different. The food was excellent, delicious, and did not disappoint as usual. However, what made tonight's meal exceptional was an ingredient not on the menu. That ingredient was our stellar server Eric L. Eric was personable, professional, and knowledgeable. His insight and suggestions for our meals were spot on from the appetizers to the entrees, to the drinks and desserts. Eric is a keeper! Give him a raise and paid vacation. I repeat Eric is a keeper! Finances allowing I would dine at Bus Boys and Poets daily if Eric could be my server. My name is Baba-C and I approved this review.
ANDREA WAS THE BEST sever. All the food I ordered was amazing. she made sure that i was good with everything!. I will definitely come back here and I would love to be served by ANDREA again
Andrea was the best server. She was on top of everything, attending to all our needs.
Great food, service and ambiance. All the staff were helpful but Eric L stood out. He was professional attentive and knowledgeable. Everything he recommended was delicious.
The food was delicious as always. Our waiter Andrea was incredible! Super attentive service, checked on us, made sure the food was good. Will be back again!
The food was delicious and our bartender June made us special surprise cocktails that tasted AWESOME! Good vibes, and a great book selection. We will definitley be back soon!

This is my 3rd time visiting Busboys and Poets, as always the service was superb. Kendall was very attentive to our needs. She took our drink order and made sure they where all to our liking. Our table was cleared as complete our different food dishes. Kendall is truly an asset to your restaurant. Bonita Hughes
Kyndal was amazing and attentive! She even let us now some hot spots in the area. 10/10 service. The catfish was good as well.
Andrea was great tonight! Quick service and extremely friendly! I would definitely recommend coming here and dining with Andrea!
the food is always excellent! Atmosphere is great, not too loud, allows for conversation. Andrea, our server was amazing and made our visit particularly enjoyable.
Kiyah was fabulous! Great service and she was so sweet :) And the drinks were amazing! Ambiance was so nice- very relaxing.
Our server, Kiyah, was personable, professional and patient. The food was excellent
My fav spot! Done If You like fried catfish (?) Get it so consistently good food & atmosphere. Chill spot

In an era where exceptional customer service is often relegated to mere corporate jargon, my recent experience at Busboys and Poets stands out as a compelling testament to the power of authentic hospitality. The establishment has cultivated a culture that not only prioritizes culinary excellence but also fosters genuine connections between staff and patrons. Recent interactions with team members Darryl, Prince, Gen, Jordan, and Ki have reinforced my belief that investing in this restaurant could yield significant returns--not merely financially but also socially.Darryl's creation of the best "self-care" drink exemplifies how attentive service can elevate a dining experience from ordinary to extraordinary. His passion for crafting beverages that promote wellness resonates deeply with health-conscious consumers today. Similarly, Prince's thoughtful gesture of bringing the "immunity" drink directly to my table illustrates an understanding of customer needs that transcends transactional interactions. Such personalized service not only enhances the dining atmosphere but also establishes loyalty among patrons who feel valued.Moreover, Ki's remarkable service and authentic conversation provided me with a sense of peace during my visit--an invaluable quality in today's fast-paced world. This level of engagement creates lasting memories and encourages customers to share their experiences within their social circles. My enthusiastic recommendations have already prompted friends to visit Busboys and Poets, suggesting that the impact of exemplary service extends far beyond individual transactions.Given these experiences, one must consider whether investing in Busboys and Poets is a prudent choice. The combination of stellar service personnel like Darryl, Prince, Gen, Jordan, and Ki creates an environment ripe for growth and profitability while enriching community connections--a dual benefit worth pursuing.

Unbelievable authentic Mexican food with lots of flavor. Unbelievable authentic Mexican food with lots of flavor. Great value for money in the brunch tasting menu. Definitely get the cafe de olla and the concha!

Well... This place has some killer food. The tacos are mouthwatering. The margaritas? I will try to order them by the pitcher. They are incredible. Only thing is, while I get 14th st is more expensive on food, this place is a little more than the rest. Be prepared to pay up. But at least it is good food!

We went here for a dinner date night last week and were overall very impressed and satisfied with our experience! We have been wanting to check out Maiz 64 for quite some time now, and it did not disappoint. We sat inside and had a really great server who walked us through all of the seasonal options on the menu, along with recommendations for the cocktail program. The cocktails were all very good--my favorite being the Alma de Maiz, for which I opted for the tequila version. I also had the Barbacoa Old Fashioned cocktail, which was unfortunately somewhat underwhelming to me even though I love a good old fashioned.I genuinely enjoyed all of the food that we had. The brisket dish that I had was some of the best brisket that I think I've ever eaten, which is not what I expected to feel! The dish was expensive, but hey...kind of what you expect from the best brisket you think you've ever had right? We left the restaurant very full, although I wish I had some space in the tummy to check out a dessert dish. Overall - I'd absolutely recommend Maiz 64 for a nice meal or special occasion. Nice atmosphere indoors, great attentive servers/staff, great cocktails and food. The reason I give 4 stars instead of 5 is that I did think the prices are somewhat expensive given what you get, and we also had a couple fruit flies hovering around our table indoors, which was a mild inconvenience. All in all, I hope to go back and hope that you check it out too!

Hurry over to Maiz 64, in my view, the finest Mexican restaurant in DC. We sampled a variety of their dishes and beverages, with a few standouts: the octopus al pastor, shrimp quesadilla, and cafe de olla were particularly exceptional. I'm eager to return and taste the pescado a la talla and other appetizers. Additionally, it's worth noting and appreciating that everyone working at Maiz 64 is Latino and the restaurant is Latino-owned. Love that aspect!

So mate, I walk into Maketto last night, looks like a nice place, never been and fancy myself up to the counter and have a chat with the bloke and order me up some grub. The Chrystal Shrimp Dumplings looks right tasty for $9 and the Num Pang Tofu Sandwich for $14 sounds good too. I ask for take out, not a problem eh? I'm tired as piss of poor service like the rest of the bloody planet yet expected to tip out me arse and pretend to like it. Bollocks, I ain't tipping for take out where I stand to order food, stand to wait and they don't do a thing but shove it in a bag. Tipping is discretionary at take out, leave a tip jar or can mate. So to my surprise after the chap prints out the ticket for me to review I take notice a "Take out Gratuity" line for $5. I ask what this is all about and the gent doesn't answer the question with an explanation but defensively asks if there is a problem. Quite right there's a problem, what the bloody hell is a "Take out Gratuity"? I politely but firmly explain by definition a "gratuity" or "tip" by definition is voluntary and if its automatic or mandatory then its a surcharge. I defended my position by stating I would permit my order to go through if the so called imposed "Gratuity" was removed. He declined and thus I had to stick to me guns and shove off. Let's do the math lad- $14+$9=$23 and now for the kicker because that pretty "Take out gratuity" is not a true voluntary tip it bloody counts like a food or drink item so it's taxed too. So, $23+$5=$28 then lets add the raging 10% sales/restaurant tax that's $2.80. Total is $30.80.  So, here's the tally, $7.80 of taxes and "Take out Gratuity" is 33.91% on a $23 take out meal. In no way should any body have to pay this much in taxes and surcharges on a meal in Washington DC or any place else. The only way mates is to say "NO" loud and clear and call these places out. I'm all for earning a decent wage, I'm all for tipping generously for sit down service but to be forced to pay for great service and receive mediocre service which lets be honest occurs a good bit o' the time is not acceptable. Maketto, what will you do? Be honest, change the language of your tickets call it what it really is a Take out Surcharge, if you want the $5 fine, continue to charge it, but don't blow smoke up our arses and call it a "gratuity". That's insulting, deceptive, and certainly excessive. 33.91% is too much to bear for working stiffs like me and I'm sure a lot of other hard working middle class folks. Maketto, what will you do?
